sources.full: Dark Souls III: Lord Seeker's Compendium

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the lizard remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal large pile of crystals.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The lizard has advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The lizard makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its tail. It can't make both attacks against the same target.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Roll
entries: The lizard moves up to 40 feet in a straight line without provoking opportunity attacks. While moving in this way, it can move through other creature's space and ignores difficult terrain. Creatures whose space it moves through must succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw or take 10 ({@damage 3d6}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Crystal Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The lizard breathes out magical crystals in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 21 ({@damage 6d6}) force damage. Additionally, that area becomes difficult terrain until the start of the lizard's next turn.

reaction.name: Crystal Armor (3/Day)
entries: The lizard adds 3 to its AC against one attack that would hit it.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hollow makes two attacks with its broken sword.

action.name: Broken Sword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Light Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 2} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d8}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Fear of Fire
entries: If the hound takes fire damage, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Unarmored Defense
entries: While the Sword Master isn't wearing armor or wielding a shield he adds his Wisdom modifier to his AC (included in his AC).

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Sword Master makes two attacks.

action.name: Uchigatana
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) slashing damage, or 8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) slashing damage if used with two hands.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: The Sword Master adds 2 to his AC against one melee attack that would hit him. To do so, the Sword Master must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

trait.name: Pus of Man
entries: When Iudex Gundyr is reduced to hit points less than half of his hit point maximum, a huge writhing mass of oily black matter bursts out of it. Iudex Gundyr loses access to his Halberd, gains access to the Large Claw attack, and gains vulnerability to fire damage.

trait.name: Weakened Husk
entries: A melee weapon deals one fewer die of its damage when Iudex Gundyr hits with it (included in the attack).

action.name: Halberd
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) slashing damage

action.name: Large Claw (Pus of Man Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d12 + 2}) slashing damage.

legendary.name: Kick
entries: Iudex Gundyr attempts to shove a creature within 5 feet of it.

legendary.name: Move
entries: Iudex Gundyr moves up to half its speed.

action.name: Greataxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d12 + 2}) slashing damage.

variant.name: Variant Hollow Soldier
entries: Some hollow soldiers use rudimentary explosives in their efforts to kill their enemies. Such hollows gain access to the firebomb action option.

entries.name: Firebomb (Recharge {@recharge 5})
entries: The soldier throws a small explosive up to 30 feet. Each creature within 5 feet of that point must succeed on a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw or take 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage.

trait.name: Varied Weaponry
entries: The soldier has different action options based on which weapon it wields: a sword, a light crossbow, or a spear.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The soldier makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) piercing damage, or 5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) piercing damage if wielded with two hands.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) slashing damage.

action.name: Light Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 2} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d8}) piercing damage plus 2 ({@damage 1d4}) fire damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hollow makes two attacks.

action.name: Knife
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) slashing damage.

bonus.name: Lightfooted
entries: The assassin can take the Dash or Disengage action .

variant.name: Variant Thrall
entries: Some thralls are armed with a flamberge in place of their axes. These thralls lose access to the Multiattack and Thrall Axe action options, and gain the greatsword action option.

entries.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw}: {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d6}) slashing damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The thrall makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Thrall Axe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Blowgun
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 30/90 ft., one target. {@h}4 piercing damage.

trait.name: Hidden Infection
entries: The pus can alter its appearance to be indistinguishable from an ordinary hollow. The process takes 1 hour. It can change back to its true form as a bonus action. While in hollow form, it uses the hollow stat block, though it has no equipment and retains this trait.

action.name: Thrash
entries: The pus thrashes wildly, attacking everything near it. Each creature within 10 feet of the pus must make a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw, taking 12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) bludgeoning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 2d4 + 3}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Brave
entries: The knight has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition frightened}.

trait.name: Varied Weaponry
entries: The hollow has different action options based on which weapon it wields: a longsword or a spear.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The knight makes two attacks.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) slashing damage, or 8 ({@damage 1d10 + 5}) slashing damage if wielded with two hands.

action.name: Lothric Spear
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Imperfect False Appearance
entries: While the mimic remains motionless, it is almost indistinguishable from a normal chest, requiring a successful {@dc 20} Wisdom (Perception) check to notice its true nature.

action.name: Slam (Mimic Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d8 + 3}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Change Shape
entries: The mimic takes the form of a wooden chest. It can revert back to its true form as a bonus action. Its statistics are the same in each form, except where noted in this stat block.

reaction.name: Bait and Bite
entries: When a Medium or smaller creature attempts to open the mimic while in in chest form, the mimic can attempt to grapple the target, making the check with advantage. On a success, the mimic makes a flurry of bites against the target, dealing 18 ({@damage 6d4 + 3}) piercing damage, and the grapple ends. Success or failure, the mimic reverts to its true form.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The darkwraith has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The darkwraith makes two attacks with its sword.

action.name: Dark Sword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Life Drain
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 5d6}) necrotic damage, and the darkwraith regains hit points equal to half the necrotic damage taken.

bonus.name: Dark Hand
entries: The darkwraith magically gains a +2 bonus to AC. This bonus lasts until the darkwraith makes an attack, is {@condition incapacitated}, or chooses to end it (no action required).

variant.name: Variant Winged Knight
entries: Some winged knights make use of a pair of handaxes instead of a halberd. These winged knights use the winged knight stat block with the following changes:
Its Halberd action option is replaced with the following action options:

entries.name: Multiattack
entries: The knight makes two attacks with its handaxes.

entries.name: Handaxe
entries: {@atk m,r} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 feet or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) slashing damage.

items: Its Spin action option affects creatures within 5 feet of it instead of within 10 feet of it.

action.name: Halberd
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d10 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Spin {@recharge 4}
entries: The knight spins around as it moves up to its speed in a straight path without provoking opportunity attacks. Each creature within 10 feet of the knight at any point during this movement must make a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw, taking 14 ({@damage 4d6}) slashing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Bestial Regression (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: If Vordt starts his turn with fewer hit points than half his hit point maximum, he lets out a bestial howl as frost begins to cover his form. He loses access to his mace attack, and gains access to the Charge and Frost Breath actions, as well as the Cold Aura trait. These changes last until the end of his next short or long rest.

trait.name: Cold Aura
entries: At the start of each of Vordt's turns, if he has fewer than half of his hit point maximum, each creature within 5 feet of him takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) cold damage.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (1/Day)
entries: If Vordt fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Vordt has advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

action.name: Mace (Must Be Above Half Hit Points)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@dice 3d6 + 3}) magical bludgeoning damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) cold damage.

action.name: Charge (Must Be Below Half Hit Points)
entries: Vordt moves up to 40 feet in a straight line without provoking opportunity attacks. While moving in this way, he can move through other creatures' spaces without being slowed. Each creature whose space he moves through must succeed on a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw or take 9 ({@damage 2d8}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Frost Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: Vordt breathes out a frostbitten breath in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) cold damage and is slowed as per the {@spell slow} spell for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't slowed.

legendary.name: Detect
entries: Vordt makes a Wisdom (Perception) check.

legendary.name: Move
entries: Vordt moves up to half his speed.

legendary.name: Fist (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Vordt makes an unarmed strike against a target within 5 feet of him ({@hit 6} to hit).

action.name: Book
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit 6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Mace
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Gnaw
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 6} to hit, range 120 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 5d6}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Fiery Embrace {@recharge 5}
entries: The evangalist attempts to grab a Medium creature within its reach in a fiery bear-hug. The target must succeed on a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw or take 21 ({@damage 6d6}) fire damage.

reaction.name: Retaliatory Strike
entries: When a creature targets the evangalist with a melee attack, the evangalist makes a book attack against the provoking creature.

trait.name: Varied Weaponry
entries: The hollow has different action options based on which weapon it wields: a pitchfork, a hammer, or a cleaver.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hollow makes two cleaver attacks.

action.name: Cleaver
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) slashing damage.

action.name: Hammer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Pitchfork
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage, or 6 ({@dice 1d8 + 2}) if wielded with two hands.

trait.name: Limited Ammunition
entries: The manservant has only one large bowl.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The manservant makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Oversized Machete
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 4d6 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Large Bowl
entries: {@atk m,r} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) bludgeoning damage. If the bowl is used for a ranged attack, it shatters.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the caged hollow remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal cage of corpses.

trait.name: Many Heads
entries: The caged hollow has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}.

action.name: Dung Pie
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 20/60 ft., one creature. {@h}The target must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute.

action.name: Flailing Limbs
entries: Each creature within 5 feet of the caged hollow must succeed on a {@dc 12} Dexterity saving throw or take 12 ({@damage 5d4}) bludgeoning damage.

variant.name: Variant Greater Demon
entries: On the route to the Smouldering Lake lurks a demon of far greater power. It use the demon stat block with the following changes:

items: It has a challenge rating of 9 (5,000 XP) and its proficiency bonus is +4.
It has 178 ({@dice 17d12 + 68}) hit points.
Its Strength score is 19 (+4).
Its Fire Breath deals 33 ({@damage 6d10}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
It gains the following action option: {@b Multiattack}. The demon makes two attacks with its greataxe.

action.name: Greataxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}23 ({@damage 3d12 + 4}) slashing damage, plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage if the demon has fewer than half of its hit points remaining.

action.name: Warcry
entries: The demon stomps its foot and lets out a thunderous warcry. Each Medium or smaller creature within 10 feet of the demon must succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Fire Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The demon breathes fire in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 ({@damage 4d10}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The rat has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The rat has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the rat's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Curse-Bloated Pustules
entries: The Greatwood has 6 pustules: one on each leg, two on its front, and two on its back. A pustule has an AC of 17, 15 hit points, and vulnerability to fire damage. If forced to make a saving throw, treat its ability scores as 10 (+0). If half the pustules are destroyed, the Greatwood is treated as if it had lost half its hit points. If all the pustules are destroyed, the Curse-Rotted Greatwood dies.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the Greatwood fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d4 + 5}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Claw (Must Be Below Half Hit Points)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) slashing damage.

action.name: Crushing Slam
entries: The Greatwood lifts itself up before slamming back down, releasing a burst of corrosive muck. Each creature within 5 feet of the Greatwood must make a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw, taking 14 ({@damage 4d6}) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Creatures in the Greatwood's space take an additional 7 ({@damage 2d6}) bludgeoning damage on a failed save, or half as mucha damage on a successful one.

If the Greatwood has fewer than half its hit points remaining, it can spend all of its movement to stand up and fall forwards as part of this, moving up to 30 feet before slamming down, falling {@condition prone}.

legendary.name: Spin
entries: The greatwood spins on the spot, striking creatures near it. Each creature within 10 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw or take 3 ({@damage 1d6}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}.

legendary.name: Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The greatwood makes an attack.

variant.name: Variant Greater Outrider Knight
entries: In Lothric Castle and the Grand Archives lurk two Boreal Outrider Knights of far greater power. They use the Boreal Outrider Knight statblock with the following changes:

items: It has a challenge rating of 18 (20,000 XP) and its proficiency bonus is +6.
It has 195 ({@dice 23d10 + 69}) hit points.
Its Strength score is 24 (+7).
It has proficiency in Constitution and Charisma saving throws (+9 and +5, respectively).
It has the Legendary Resistance trait (described below).
Its Multiattack now makes four attacks.
Its longwsord attack has {@hit 13} to hit and deals 16 ({@damage 2d8 + 7}) magical slashing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) cold damage on a hit.

entries.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day).
entries: If the outrider knight fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The outrider knight has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The outrider knight makes two attacks.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@dice 2d8 + 3}) magical slashing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) cold damage.

action.name: Frost Breath {@recharge}
entries: The outrider knight breathes out a frostbitten breath in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) cold damage and is slowed as per the {@spell slow} spell for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't slowed.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The corvian makes three attacks with its greatknife, or two attacks with its scythe.

action.name: Greatknife
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) slashing damage

action.name: Scythe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) slashing damage.

bonus.name: Winged Transformation (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: Wings burst out of the corvian's back. For the next minute, the corvian has a flying speed of 30 feet. If the corvian ends its turn in the air, it immediately falls.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The madwoman makes two attacks.

action.name: Butcher Knife
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) slashing damage. If the target is a creature, the madwoman regains a number of hit points equal to half the damage dealt.

action.name: Dung Pie
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute.

bonus.name: Sharpen (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The madwoman sharpens her cleaver. Until the end of her next turn, whenever the madwoman hits a creature with her large cleaver, she regains an additional {@dice 1d6} hit points.

action.name: Staff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) bludgeoning damage or 6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) bludgeoning damage if wielded with two hands.

action.name: Poison Mist
entries: The storyteller releases poison gas in a 15-foot cube. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Fire Spray
entries: The storyteller releases a stream of fire in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw, taking 11 ({@damage 2d10}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

bonus.name: Winged Transformation (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: Wings burst out of the storyteller's back. For the next minute, the storyteller has a flying speed of 30 feet. If the storyteller ends its turn in the air, it immediately falls.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The hunter has advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the hunter's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Oversized Pike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 2d10 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Pincer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The crab makes two attacks with its pincers

action.name: Pincer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d6 + 6}) piercing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 16}). The crab has two claws, each of which can only grapple one target.

action.name: Foaming Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The crab breathes foam in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw or take 18 ({@damage 4d8}) bludgeoning damage and have its speed reduced by 10 feet until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d6}) bludgeoning damage

action.name: Release Poison {@recharge 4}
entries: The bug releases a cloud of poisonous spores that fill a 5-foot sphere centered on itself. This cloud lasts until the end of the bug's next turn. This area is heavily obscured, and each creature that starts its turn in the area, or enters it for the first time on a turn, must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. While {@condition poisoned} in this way, a creature takes 2 ({@damage 1d4}) poison damage at the end of each of its turns. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

trait.name: Blood Frenzy
entries: The lycanthrope has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The lycanthrope makes three attacks, only one of which can be a bite.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature that is {@condition grappled} by the lycanthrope. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) slashing damage. Instead of dealing damage, the lycanthrope can grapple the target (escape {@dc 13}).

action.name: Staff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d6}) bludgeoning damage or 4 ({@damage 1d8}) bludgeoning damage if wielded with two hands.

action.name: Soul Spear
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 5} to hit, range 120 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 4d6}) force damage.

variant.name: Variant: Catherdral Hollows
entries: The Cathedral of the Deep has three different variants of the hollow devout: a flaming crossbow, a flaming longsword, and an immolater. These use the hollow devout stat block with the following changes:

items: Its has a heavy crossbow instead of a spear or longsword.

It gains access to the following action option: {@b {@i Heavy Crossbow.}} {@atk rw}: {@hit 4} to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. Hit: 7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) piercing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage.
It has a challenge rating of 2 (450 XP)
Its longsword deals an additional 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage on a hit.
It has a challenge rating of 2 (450 XP)
Its loses access to the spear and longsword action options.

It gains access to the following action option: {@b {@i Sacrificial Burst.}} The hollow sets itself on fire. At the end of its turn, the hollow explodes in flames and is killed. Each creature witin 5 feet of the hollow must make a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw, taking 14 ({@damage 4d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Varied Weaponry
entries: The hollow has different action options based on which weapon it wields: a longsword or a spear.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hollow makes two attacks.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) slashing damage, or 7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) slashing damage if wielded with two hands.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage, or 6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage if wielded with two hands.

trait.name: Mighty Wielder
entries: The knight can wield a two-handed melee weapon in one hand and make attacks with it one-handed.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The knight makes three melee attacks.

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 4d6 + 7}) slashing damage, plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) slashing damage if the target is a demon. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 18} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Mighty Wielder
entries: The watchdog can wield a two-handed melee weapon in one hand and make attacks with it one-handed.

trait.name: Varied Weaponry
entries: The watchdog has different action options based on which weapon it wields: a greatsword (and gains the Spin Slash action) or a greatclub (and gains the Heal action).

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The watchdog makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) slashing damage.

action.name: Spin Slash {@recharge 5}
entries: The watchdog spins, swinging its blade in an arc around it. Every creature within 5 feet of the watchdog must succeed on a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw or take 12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) slashing damage.

action.name: Oversized Greatclub
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Heal {@recharge}
entries: The watchdog regains up to 20 hit points.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the crystal sage fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The crystal sage has advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

action.name: Rapier
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) piercing damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) force damage.

action.name: Soul Spear
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 8} to hit, range 120 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 6d6}) force damage.

action.name: Soul Crystal Mass
entries: The crystal sage sends out an orb of magical crystal at a creature it can see within 120 feet. The target must succeed on a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw or take 18 ({@damage 4d8}) force damage and be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: White Dragon Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The sage magically sends out a beam of energy, which produces magical crystals in a 40 ft. line 5 feet wide. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 ({@damage 5d8}) force damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a success.

reaction.name: Teleporting Escape
entries: In response to being damaged, the crystal sage magically teleports up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

If the sage has less than half of its hit points remainin, it also creates up to 3 clones, which appear in unoccupied spaces within 30 feet of the sage's destination. The clones act after the crystal sage on the same initiative count and use the statistics for the crystal sage, but have 1 hit point, no legendary resistances, can only use soul crystal mass and have no legendary actions. These clones last until reduced to 0 hit points, or until the crystal sage is reduced to 0 hit points or uses this reaction again.

legendary.name: Create Crystals
entries: The crystal sage creates magical crystals in up to 7 5-foot-square unoccupied spaces it can see within 30 feet of it. These areas become difficult terrain.

legendary.name: Rapier (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The crystal sage makes an attack with its rapier.

legendary.name: Homing Crystal Soul Mass (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The crystal sage summons several darts of solidified magic. The next time a creature starts its turn within 5 feet of the sage or enters within 5 feet of the sage, it must succeed on a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw or take 17 ({@damage 5d6}) force damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The brigand makes two battleaxe attacks.

action.name: Battleaxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) slashing damage, or 10 ({@damage 1d10 + 5}) slashing damage if wielded with two hands. While warcry is active, it deals 12 ({@dice 1d8 + 5}{@dice  + 1d4}) slashing damage, or 13 ({@dice 1d10 + 5}{@dice  + 1d4}) slashing damage if wielded with two hands.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d4 + 5}) piercing damage, or 10 ({@damage 2d4 + 5}) piercing damage if used to make a melee attack while warcry is active.

bonus.name: Warcry (Recharges After a Short or Long Rest)
entries: The brigand roars, strengthening his blows temporarily. For the next 1 minute, the brigand deals an additional {@damage 1d4} damage when he hits with a melee attack.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The knight makes two longsword attacks. If it has a dagger drawn, it can also make a dagger attack.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) slashing damage, or 9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) slashing damage if wielded with two hands.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Fear of Fire
entries: If the corpse takes fire damage, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Fear of Fire
entries: If the grub takes fire damage, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The grub makes two slam attacks.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature other than a construct or undead, they are also covered in leeches for 1 minute. While these leeches cover them, a creature loses 4 ({@dice 1d8}) hit points due to blood loss. A creature can scrape the leeches off as an action. The leeches also fall off if the creature takes fire damage or holds a lit torch.

trait.name: Fear of Fire
entries: If the grub takes fire damage, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature other than a construct or undead, they are also covered in leeches. While these leeches cover them, a creature loses 4 ({@dice 1d8}) hit points due to blood loss. A creature can scrape the leeches off as an action. The leeches also fall off if the creature takes fire damage or holds a lit torch.

action.name: Puke Leeches {@recharge 5}
entries: The corpse vomits leeches at a creature within 10 feet of it. The target must succeed on a {@dc 12} Dexterity saving throw or be covered in leeches. While these leeches cover them, a creature loses 9 ({@dice 2d8}) hit points at the start of each of its turns due to blood loss. A creature can scrape the leeches off as an action. The leeches also fall off if the creature takes fire damage or holds a lit torch. Constructs and undead are immune to these leeches.

variant.name: Variant: Greatsword Cathedral Knight
entries: Some cathedral knights weild enourmous greatswords in place of a shield and mace. Such knights use the cathedral knight statblock with the following changes:

items: Its AC becomes 18 ({@item plate armor|phb|plate})
It loses the Blessed Weapon bonus action.
It loses access to the Mace Attack, and gains access to the Greatsword attack.
{@b {@i Greatsword.}} {@atk mw}: {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 18 ({@damage 4d6 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The knight makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Mace
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Heal {@recharge 5}
entries: The knight regains 30 hit points.

bonus.name: Blessed Weapon (Recharge 6)
entries: The knight blesses its mace with divine power for 1 minute. While blessed, the knight's mace deals an additional 7 ({@damage 2d6}) radiant damage.

trait.name: Unarmored Defense
entries: While the grave warden isn't wearing armor or wielding a shield it adds its Wisdom modifier to its AC (included in its AC).

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The grave warden makes three attacks with its twinblade. If it has a second twinblade drawn, it can make one additional attack with its twinblade.

action.name: Warden Twinblade
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The knight makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Mace
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Heal {@recharge 5}
entries: The knight regains 30 hit points.

bonus.name: Blessed Weapon (Recharge 6)
entries: The knight blesses its mace with divine power for 1 minute. While blessed, the knight's mace deals an additional 7 ({@damage 2d6}) radiant damage.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The devout has advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

action.name: Firebolt
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 5} to hit, range 120 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d10}) fire damage.

action.name: Candestick
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The devout has advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

action.name: Firebolt
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 6} to hit, range 120 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d10}) fire damage.

action.name: Candestick
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Force {@recharge 5}
entries: The deacon recites a prayer and releases a burst of power. Each hostile creature within 5 feet of the devout must make a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) force damage and is pushed up to 10 feet away from the devout, landing {@condition prone}. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage and isn't pushed.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The deep accursed can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.name: Standing Leap
entries: The deep accursed's long jump is up to 30 feet and its high jump is up to 15 feet, with or without a running start.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit 15 ({@dice 3d6 + 5}) , and the target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw against being magically {@condition petrified}. On a failed save, the creature begins to turn to stone and is {@condition restrained}. It must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn. On a success, the effect ends. On a failure, the creature is {@condition petrified} until freed by the {@spell greater restoration} spell or other magic.

action.name: Curse Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The deep accursed exhales petrifying gas in a 15-foot cube. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature is {@condition poisoned}. The {@condition poisoned} target must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn. On a success, the effect ends on the target. On a failure, the target is {@condition petrified} until freed by the {@spell greater restoration} spell or other magic.

variant.name: Variant: Lesser Slave Giant
entries: In Irithyll, slave giants can be found of a much smaller size than their cathedral-trapped kin. They use the slave giant statblock with the following changes:

items: It is Huge.
It has 87 ({@damage 7d12 + 42}) hit points.
Its Slam attack has a reach of 10 ft. and deals 18 ({@damage 3d6 + 8}) bludgeoning damage on a hit.
It loses access to the Splash action.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The giant has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}22 ({@damage 4d6 + 8}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Splash
entries: The giant splashes diseased water at a creature within 100 feet of it. The target must succeed on a {@dc 10} Dexterity saving throw or be covered in the water. If the target is a humanoid, it must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or become infected with sewer plague (see DMG, pg. 257).

variant.name: Variant: Smouldering Flesh
entries: In the Smouldering Lake exist blobs of flesh that have adapted to the flames and demonic power found there. Smouldering flesh uses the rotten flesh statblock with the following changes.

items: It has a challenge rating of 3 (700 XP)
It has immunity to fire damage and vulnerability to lightning and necrotic damage.
It gains access to the following action option:
{@b {@i Fire Breath.}} The flesh breathes fire in a 10-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw or take 14 ({@damage 4d6}) fire damage.

trait.name: Amorphous
entries: The rotten flesh can occupy another creature's space.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The rotten flesh has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The rotten flesh can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

action.name: Thrust
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Drop
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, one creature directly underneath the rotten flesh. {@h}14 ({@damage 4d6}) acid damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 13}). While {@condition grappled} in this way, the target is {@condition restrained} and the rotten flesh can't move or take actions. If the target is still {@condition grappled} at the end of its next turn, it takes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) acid damage and the grapple ends.

variant.name: Variant: Man-Grub Caster
entries: Some man-grubs weild a magical staff that enables them to send out divine projectiles. These man-grubs gain access to the following action option:

entries.name: Divine Bident
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 5} to hit, range 120 ft., one target. Hit: 14 ({@damage 4d6}) radiant damage.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The man-grub can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 1} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d8 - 1}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Puke Leeches {@recharge 5}
entries: The man-grub vomits leeches at a creature within 10 feet of it. The target must succeed on a {@dc 12} Dexterity saving throw or be covered in leeches. While these leeches cover them, a creature loses 9 ({@dice 2d8}) hit points at the start of each of its turns due to blood loss. A creature can scrape the leches off as an action. The leeches also fall off if the creature takes fire damage or holds a lit torch. Constructs and undead are immune to these leeches.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The devout has advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

action.name: Large Candestick
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Blast of Dark (Takes 2 ACTIONS)
entries: Working with 2 of the elite fat devouts who must remain within 10 feet of Royce, he creates a large ball of darkness, which they then fling at a creature of their choice within 150 feet. The target gains no benefit from cover. The target must make a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw, taking 37 ({@damage 7d10}) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful save.

action.name: Petrifying Aura (Takes 3 ACTIONS)
entries: Working with 3 of the elite fat devouts who must remain within 10 feet of Royce, he generates a field of petrification. Each creature within 120 feet of Royce must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw. On a failure, they are {@condition restrained} as they begin turning to stone. At the end of their next turn, a creature must reattempt the saving throw. On a failure, they are {@condition petrified}. On a success, the effect ends.

variant.name: Variant: Ghru Conjurator
entries: Remnants of the spellcasting helpers of the Undead Legion, these ghru can spew out clouds of poison. The conjurators use the ghru stat block with the following aciton option:

entries.name: Poison Cloud ({@recharge 4})
entries: The conjurator breathes a cloud of poison gas that fills a 15-foot cube and lasts until the end of its next turn. This area is heavily obscured, and each creature that starts its turn in the cloud or enters it for the first time on a turn must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. A target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Ghru makes two attacks.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) piercing damage, and if the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. While {@condition poisoned} in this way, the target takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) poison damage at the start of each of its turns. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

trait.name: Natural Camouflage
entries: The slug has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks when in a swamp.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Poison Spit
entries: The slug spews poison at a creature within 10 feet of it. The target must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or take 6 ({@damage 1d12}) poison damage and be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. The target can repeat the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

trait.name: Standing Leap
entries: The leaper's long jump is up to 30 feet and its high jump is up to 15 feet, with or without a running start.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The leaper makes two claw attacks

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit 12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) slashing damage.

action.name: Maul {@recharge 5}
entries: The Ghru attampts to savagely maul a Medium or smaller creature within 5 feet of it. The target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw or take 32 ({@damage 5d10 + 5}) slashing damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The spearman makes two attacks.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) piercing damage, and if the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. While {@condition poisoned} in this way, the target takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) poison damage at the start of each of its turns. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

trait.name: Standing Leap
entries: The basilisk's long jump is up to 20 feet and its high jump is up to 10 feet, with or without a running start.

trait.name: Fowl Appearance
entries: While the creature remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal chicken.

action.name: Petrifying Breath
entries: The basilisk exhales petrifying gas in a 15-foot cube. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a target is {@condition poisoned}. The {@condition poisoned} target must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn. On a success, the effect ends on the target. On a failure, the target is {@condition petrified} until freed by the {@spell greater restoration} spell or other magic.

action.name: Tree Club
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 3d8 + 6}) bludgeoning damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Dark Burst
entries: The elder ghru releases a cloud of ethereal skulls from its tree club at a creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target make a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw, taking 27 ({@damage 6d8}) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Shockwave {@recharge 5}
entries: The elder ghru slams its tree club into the ground, before yanking it out to produce a shockwave. The elder ghru makes an attack with its tree club against a creature within reach. Hit or miss, the target and each creature other than the elder ghru within 30 feet of the target must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw, taking 7 ({@damage 2d6}) bludgeoning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Breakable Legs
entries: If the stray demon takes more than 40 points of damage from a single creature on a turn, its legs crumble underneath it. The demon falls {@condition prone} and can't stand up. This effect lasts until the stray demon finishes a short or long rest.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The stray demon makes two attacks: one with with its maul and one with its slam.

action.name: Maul
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 4d6 + 6}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}22 ({@damage 3d10 + 6}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Grab
entries: The stray demon attempts to grab and squeeze a Medium or smaller creature within 5 feet of it. The target must make a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 39 ({@damage 6d10 + 6}) bludgeoning damage and is thrown up to 30 feet away from the stray demon, landing {@condition prone}. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage and isn't thrown.

action.name: Boulder Heave {@recharge 5}
entries: The stray demon spews chunks of rock in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes 33 ({@damage 6d10}) bludgeoning damage and is pushed up to 10 feet away from the stray demon, landing {@condition prone}. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage and isn't pushed.

monster.name: Abyss Watcher

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the abyss watcher fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Lord of Cinder (Mythic Trait; Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: If the abyss watcher is reduced to 0 hit points, it doesn't die or fall {@condition unconscious}. Instead, the abyss watcher regains 97 hit points. Additionally, until its next rest, it gains resistance to fire damage, and its weapon attacks deal an additional 5 ({@damage 2d4}) fire damage (included in the attack).

trait.name: Mighty Wielder
entries: The abyss watcher can wield a two-handed melee weapon in one hand and make attacks with it one-handed.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The abyss watcher makes two attacks with its greatsword.

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) slashing damage, plus 5 ({@damage 2d4}) fire damage while its mythic trait is active.

action.name: Knife
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d4 + 5}) slashing damage.

action.name: Sliding Slash {@recharge 5}
entries: The abyss watcher dashes up to 30 feet along the ground, dragging its sword in a 5-foot-wide line. Each creature in this line must make a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw, taking 14 ({@damage 4d6}) slashing damage plus 5 ({@damage 2d4}) fire damage while its mythic trait is active, or half as much damage on a successful save.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: The abyss watcher adds 4 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the abyss watcher must see the attacker and be wielding its knife.

legendary.name: Move
entries: The abyss watcher moves up to half its speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: The abyss watcher makes one attack with its greatsword.

legendary.name: Command Ally (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The abyss watcher targets one ally it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see and hear the abyss watcher, the target can make one weapon attack as a reaction and gains advantage on the attack roll.

legendary.name: Knife Flourish (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The abyss watcher makes three knife attacks against one target.

mythicHeader: If the abyss watcher's mythic trait is active, it can use the options below as legendary actions for 1 hour after using Lord of Cinder.

mythic.name: Fiery Burst (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The abyss watcher slams its greatsword onto a point within 5 feet of it. Each creature other than the abyss watcher within 5 feet of that point must make a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw, taking 14 ({@damage 4d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

mythic.name: Lunging Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The abyss watcher leaps up to 20 feet without provoking opportunity attacks before making an attack with its greatsword with advantage on the attack roll.

monster.name: Gravewarden Skeleton

variant.name: Variant: Gravewarden Skeleton
entries: Some gravewardens focus on raw damage over defense, reflecting the Carthus drive for victory at any cost. Such gravewardens use the gravewarden skeleton statblock with the following changes:

items: Its AC becomes 15 (armor scraps)
It wields a carthus curved greatsword instead of a carthus curved sword. {@b @i Greatsword.}} {@atk mw}: {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 21 ({@damage 5d6 + 4}) slashing damage.
It gains the following action:

items.name: Spin Slash ({@recharge 5})
entries: The gravewarden spins, swinging its blade in an arc around it. Every creature within 5 feet of the gravewarden must succeed on a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw or take 21 ({@damage 5d6 + 4}) slashing damage.

languages: understands all languages it knew in life but can't speak

trait.name: Brute
entries: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the gravewarden hits with it (included in the attack).

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The gravewarden makes two attacks.

action.name: Sword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 3d8 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Milkring Movement
entries: The gravewarden turns {@condition invisible} and moves up to its movement. This invisibility lasts until the end of this movement.

reaction.name: Milkring Dodge
entries: If an attack misses the gravewarden, it turns {@condition invisible} until the start of its next turn.

monster.name: Carthus Skeleton

variant.name: Variant: Carthus Skeleton
entries: Some carthus skeletons are filled with a deathly will to resist death. These skeleton's eyes glow white and they have the following feature:

items: It has a challenge rating of 2 (450 XP).

items.name: White Eyes (Recharges After a Short or Long Rest)
entries: If the skeleton is reduced to 0 hit points by damage that is not radiant, it falls {@condition unconscious} and is stabilised. In this state, it is indistuigishable from a dead skeleton. At the start of its next turn, it regains full hit points.

languages: understands all languages it knew in life but can't speak

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The skeleton makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Scimitar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage.

monster.name: Bonewheel Skeleton
languages: understands all languages it knew in life but can't speak

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The skeleton makes two slam attacks.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Roll
entries: The skeleton rolls up to 60 feet in a straight line, ignoring difficult terrain. If a creature is in the skeletons path, the creature must make a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) slashing damage for every 10 feet the skeleton has rolled and is knocked {@condition prone}, and the skeleton stops rolling. On a successful save, the target takes no damage and the skeleton is able to continue rolling through its space.

monster.name: Headless Skeleton
languages: understands all languages it knew in life but can't speak

trait.name: Standing Leap
entries: The skeleton's long jump is up to 30 feet and its high jump is up to 15 feet, with or without a running start.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The skeleton makes two attacks.

action.name: Falchion
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) slashing damage.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: The skeleton adds 2 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the skeleton must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

monster.name: Carthus Swordsman Skeleton
languages: understands all languages it knew in life but can't speak

trait.name: Evasion
entries: If the skeleton is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

trait.name: Standing Leap
entries: The skeleton's long jump is up to 30 feet, and its high jump up to 15 feet, with or without a run up.

trait.name: Unarmored Defense
entries: While the skeleton isn't wearing armor or wielding a shield it adds its Wisdom modifier to its AC (included in its AC).

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The skeleton makes three attacks.

action.name: Kukri
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 8} to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d4 + 5}) piercing damage.

action.name: Shotel
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) slashing damage.

reaction.name: Nimble Counterattack
entries: If a melee attack misses the skeleton, it can jump up to 15 feet without triggering attacks of opportunity and make an attack with its kukri against the triggering creature.

trait.name: Annihilating Aura
entries: Any creature that starts its turn in Wolnir's space or enters his space for the first time on its turn takes 21 ({@damage 6d6}) necrotic damage. Undead are immune to this aura.

trait.name: Blessed Armlets
entries: Wolnir wears 3 golden armlets, two on his left arm and one on his right. When a creature targets Wolnir with an attack, they can instead target an armlet. The armlets are objects with AC 17, vulnerability to bludgeoning damage, immunity to poison and psychic damage, and 40 hit points, and the attack against them is made at disadvantage. If Wolnir is subjected to a spell that deals damage in an area, any armlets in that area takes the same damage as Wolnir (before resistances).
When an armlet is reduced to 0 hit points, it shatters, and Wolnir is {@condition stunned} until the start of his next turn.
If all three armlets are shattered, Wolnir is instantly transported to the Negative Energy Plane, where he is destroyed.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Wolnir fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

action.name: Holy Sword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}26 ({@dice 4d8 + 8}) magical slashing damge plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) radiant damage.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}22 ({@damage 4d6 + 8}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Breath of the Grave {@recharge}
entries: Wolnir exhales a deadly dark cloud in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in this area must make a {@dc 20} Constitution saving throw, taking 45 ({@damage 10d8}) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Radiant Blast (Must Be Wielding Holy Sword)
entries: Wolnir raises his holy sword before slamming it point-first into the ground, banishing the sword in a blast of radiant energy. Each creature within 30 feet of Wolnir must make a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 35 ({@damage 10d6}) radiant damage and is knocked {@condition prone}. On a success, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't knocked {@condition prone}.

legendary.name: Move
entries: Wolnir moves up to his speed.

legendary.name: Conjure Blade (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Wolnir magically summons his Holy Sword to his hands.

legendary.name: Summon Undead (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Up to 5 carthus skeletons appear in unoccupied spaces within 30 feet of Wolnor and remain until destroyed. Undead summoned in this way roll initiative and act in the next available turn. Wolnir can have up to 5 skeletons summoned by this ability at a time.

trait.name: Tunneler
entries: The sandworm can burrow through solid rock at half its burrow speed and leaves a 10-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}22 ({@damage 3d8 + 9}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Charge
entries: The sandworm moves up to 50 feet. While moving in this way, it can move through other creature's space without being slowed. Each creature whose space it moves through must succeed on a {@dc 21} Dexterity saving throw or take 26 ({@damage 5d6 + 9}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Lightning Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The Sandworm breathes lightning in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw, taking 66 ({@damage 12d10}) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Horace fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Horace makes three attacks.

action.name: Horace's Halberd
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) piercing damage, or 10 ({@damage 1d10 + 5}) slashing damage if used with two hands.

bonus.name: Shield Master
entries: Horace doffs or dons his shield.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: Horace adds 4 to his AC against one melee attack that would hit him. To do so, Horace must see the attacker and be wielding his shield.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: Horace makes one attack with his halberd.

legendary.name: Move
entries: Horace moves up to half his speed.

action.name: Fire Breath
entries: The statue breathes fire in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw, taking 10 ({@damage 3d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The ghru can innately cast burning hands at will. Its innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (save {@dc 17}).

action.name: Machete
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 feet, one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 2d12 + 5}) slashing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, they must succeed on a {@dc 16} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Chaos Orb
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 9} to hit, range 60 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 6d6}) fire damage.

action.name: Summon Flame Orb {@recharge 4}
entries: The ghru magically creates a floating orb, born from the fires of Chaos. The orb uses the flame orb statblock, rolls its own initiative, and is under the ghru's control (no action required). The flame orb lasts until it is reduced to 0 hit points, or the ghru dies.

monster.name: Flame Orb
languages: understands all the languages of its creator but can't speak

trait.name: Summoned Power
entries: The fire orb gains a bonus to attack rolls equal to the spellcasting ability modifier of the creature who summoned it (included in the attack).

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The fire orb uses Firebolt three times.

action.name: Firebolt
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 11} to hit, range 120 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d10}) fire damage.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Tsorig fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Mighty Wielder
entries: Tsorig can wield a two-handed melee weapon in one hand and make attacks with it one-handed. If the attack is made with a weapon sized for a Large creature (such as the Fume Ultra Greatsword), the one-handed attack is made at disadvantage.

trait.name: Outsize Strength
entries: Tsorig can use weapons sized for Large creatures with two hands without disadvantage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Tsorig makes two attacks.

action.name: Fume Ultra Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 4d6 + 5}) slashing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 17} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

legendary.name: Detect
entries: Tsorig makes a Wisdom (Perception) check.

legendary.name: Weapon Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Tsorig makes a weapon attack.

trait.name: Final Flame (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: If the Old Demon King is reduced to less than 30 hit points, he expends the last of his inner flame in an explosion of fire. Each creature within 20 feet of the old demon king must make a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 ({@damage 5d8}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. After using this feature, the Old Demon King is {@condition incapacitated}, {@condition prone}, and has speed of 0. These effects last until the end of his next short or long rest.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the Old Demon King fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

action.name: Demon Greatclub
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@dice 3d8 + 6}) magical bludgeoning damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage, plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage if the Old Demon King has less than half of its total hit points remaining.

action.name: Combustion
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 3d6}) fire damage.

action.name: Meteor Storm {@recharge 5}
entries: The Old Demon King waves his axe high, summoning large meteors that rain down on a point within 120 feet of him that he can see. Each creature within 30 feet of that point must make a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw, taking 18 ({@damage 4d8}) bludgeoning damage and 18 ({@damage 4d8}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a succesdful one.

legendary.name: Combustion
entries: The Old Demon King uses Combustion.

legendary.name: Ring of Fire
entries: A ring of flames extends along the ground from the Old Demon King before contracting back towards him. Each creature on the ground within 45 feet of the Old Demon King must succeed on a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw or take 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage.

legendary.name: Fire Breath (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The Old Demon King breathes fire in a 45-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw or take 10 ({@damage 3d6}) fire damage.

trait.name: Charge
entries: If the beast moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a bite attack immediately after that movement on the same turn, the target takes an extra 19 ({@damage 3d12}) piercing damage

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The beast makes two bite attacks.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}25 ({@damage 3d12 + 6}) piercing damage.

action.name: Lightning Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The beast exhales lightning on the ground on a point within 5 feet of it. Each creature other than the beast within 30 feet of that point must make a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw, taking 44 ({@damage 8d10}) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

variant.name: Variant: Pontiff Knight
entries: In Irithyll there lies a pontiff knight who wields a greatscythe in place of a shield and scimitar as it protects the path to its Pontiff. This variant uses the pontiff knight stat block with the following changes:

items: It has AC 17 (half plate)
It loses access to its scimitar and Spin action options.
It gains access to the greatscythe action option:

items.name: Greatscythe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 10 feet, one target. Hit: 12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) slashing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) cold damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The knight makes three melee attacks. It can replace on of these attacks with a use of its Spin.

action.name: Scimitar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) slashing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) cold damage.

action.name: Deep Soul
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 7} to hit, range 120 feet, one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 4d8}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Spin {@recharge 4}
entries: The knight generates a spectral blade of frigid energy around its sword, extending its reach as it spins once. Each creature within 10 feet of the knight must succeed on a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw or take 8 ({@damage 1d6 + 6}) slashing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) cold damage.

trait.name: Limited Invisibility
entries: The slave is {@condition invisible} to creatures more than 5 feet away from it.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The slave has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Sneak Attack
entries: Once per turn, the slave deals an extra 10 ({@damage 3d6}) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the slave that isn't {@condition incapacitated} and the slave doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@dice 1d6 + 2})

action.name: Farron Dart
entries: {@atk rs} +3, range 90 feet, one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 3d6}) force damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The fire witch's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (save {@dc 17}). She can innately cast the following spells, requiring only her immolation tinder as a component:

action.name: Immolation Tinder
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@dice 2d8 + 5}) plus 21 ({@damage 6d6}) fire damage, and if the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is thrown up to 30 feet, landing {@condition prone}.

action.name: Fire Burst {@recharge 5}
entries: The fire witch summons a burst of flames in a 5-foot cylinder that is 10-feet-high from a point of the ground within 120 feet of it. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes 35 ({@damage 10d6}) fire damage and is knocked {@condition prone}. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage and isn't knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Fear of Fire
entries: If the hound takes fire damage, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The beast-hound makes two bite attacks.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 2d4 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The knight makes three melee attacks.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) slashing damage, or 17 ({@damage 2d10 + 6}) slashing damage if used with two hands, plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) lightning damage while Lightning Blade is active.

action.name: Greatbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 10} to hit, range 150/500 feet, one target. {@h}24 ({@damage 4d8 + 6}) piercing damage.

bonus.name: Lightning Blade (Recharge 6)
entries: The knight channels divine power to coat its blade in lightning for 1 minute. When it hits with an attack with its longsword, it deals an additional 3 ({@damage 1d6}) lightning damage.

bonus.name: Shield Master
entries: The knight doffs or dons its shield.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The sewer centipede can breathe air and water.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Toxic Sludge {@recharge 5}
entries: The sewer centipede sprays poison at a creature within 15 feet of it. The target must make a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw, taking 44 ({@damage 8d10}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Mighty Wielder
entries: Sulyvahn can wield a two-handed melee weapon in each hand and make attacks with them one-handed.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Sulyvahn fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Power of the Deep (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: If Sulyvahn starts his turn with fewer hit points than half his hit point maximum, he lets out a burst of dark energy as root-like wings sprout from his back. Each creature within 10 feet of Sulyvan must make a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 ({@damage 4d10}) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Until the end of his next short or long rest, Sulyvahn has a flying speed of 60 ft. If Sulyvahn ends his turn in the air, he immediately falls.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Sulyvahn makes two attacks: one with his greatsword of judgement and one with his profaned greatsword.

action.name: Greatsword of Judgement
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@dice 4d6 + 4}) magical slashing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) force damage.

action.name: Profaned Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@dice 4d6 + 4}) magical slashing damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) fire damage.

action.name: Soul Spear (Must Be Below Half Hit Points)
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 9} to hit, range 60 ft., one target. {@h}39 ({@damage 6d12}) force damage.

action.name: Soul Wave (Must Be Below Half Hit Points)
entries: Sulyvahn swings his greatsword of judgement, sending out an arc of magical energy in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw or take 22 ({@damage 4d10}) force damage.

action.name: Create Clone (Must Be Below Half Hit Points)
entries: Sulyvahn holds his greatsword of judgement before him, summoning a spectral clone of himself. The clone uses Sulyvahn's statistics, but has 40 hit points, lacks Legendary Resistance, and can occupy Sulyvahn's space. The clone acts immediately before Sulyvahn on the same initiative count, taking the exact same movement and actions as Sulyvahn is going to (including the same targets). The clone also takes the same legendary actions and REACTIONS as Sulyvahn, though it always acts before him.
If Sulyvahn starts his turn with the clone in a different space than his, the clone instantly teleports to his space.
Sulyvahn can only have one clone summoned at a time.

legendary.name: Detect
entries: Sulyvahn makes a Wisdom (Perception) check.

legendary.name: Move
entries: Sulyvahn moves up to his speed.

legendary.name: Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Sulyvahn makes one attack with either of his greatswords.

trait.name: Fire Aura (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: If Aldrich starts his turn with fewer hit points than half his hit point maximum, he ignites until the end of his next rest. A creature that touches Aldrich or hits him with a melee attack while within 5 feet of him takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage.

trait.name: Freedom of Movement
entries: Aldrich ignores difficult terrain, and magical effects can't reduce his speed or cause him to be {@condition restrained}. He can spend 5 feet of movement to escape from nonmagical restraints or being {@condition grappled}.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Aldrich fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Aldrich has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Aldrich uses Soul Spear twice.

action.name: Gravelord Halberd
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}38 ({@damage 7d8 + 7}) force damage

action.name: Soul Spear
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 13} to hit, range 120 ft., one target. {@h}28 ({@damage 8d6}) force damage. This attack ignores cover.

action.name: Arrow Barrage {@recharge 5}
entries: Aldrich shoots an arrow into the sky, causing magical arrows to rain down in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 21} Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 ({@damage 5d8}) piercing damage plus 22 ({@damage 5d8}) force damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

If Aldrich is at less than half of his hit point maximum, the arrows instead land in a continuous 100-foot path that is 5 feet wide originating from Aldrich. Aldrich chooses the shape of this path, though a creature can only take damage from the arrows once per turn.

legendary.name: Detect
entries: Aldrich makes a Wisdom (Perception) check.

legendary.name: Soul Mass
entries: Aldrich moves up to half his speed, releasing magical orbs that home in on nearby creatures. Each creature within 45 feet of Aldrich at any point during this movement must make a {@dc 21} Dexterity saving throw, taking 11 ({@damage 2d10}) force damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary.name: Delayed Teleport (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Aldrich vanishes, magically disappearing into a demiplane until the start of his next turn, when he reappears in an unoccupied space within 90 feet of where he left. Creatures within 5 feet of Aldrich when he disappears take 22 ({@damage 4d10}) necrotic damage.

legendary.name: Lifehunt Scythe (Costs 3 Actions; Must Be Below Half Hit Points)
entries: Aldrich summons a huge spectral scythe, spinning it around twice. Every creature within 10 feet of Aldrich must succeed on a {@dc 21} Dexterity saving throw or take 21 ({@damage 6d6}) necrotic damage, and Aldrich regains a number of hit points equal to half the total damage dealt.

trait.name: Varied Weaponry
entries: The wretch has different action options based on which weapon it wields: a shortsword or a spear.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) piercing damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) force damage.

action.name: Wretch Spear
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) piercing damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) force damage.

action.name: Acid Spit {@recharge}
entries: The wretch vomits acid at a creature it can see within 10 feet of it. The target must succeed on a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw or take 21 ({@damage 6d6}) acid damage. Additionally, on a failed save, any object made of ferrous metal that is being worn or carried by the target is affected by this acid.
Any metal armor or shield takes a permanent and cumulative -1 penalty to the AC it offers. Armor reduced to an AC of 10 or a shield that drops to a +0 bonus is destroyed.
Any nonmagical weapon made of metal takes a permanent and cumulative -1 penalty to damage rolls. If its penalty drops to -5, the weapon is destroyed.

trait.name: Death Gaze
entries: At the start of each of the jailer's turns, each creature of its choice that it can see within 60 feet of it has their hit point maximum reduced by 22 ({@dice 4d10}), to a minumum of 10 hit points. This reduction lasts for a creature until it spends at least 1 minute out of sight of the jailer.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
