entries: The jailer has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Brand
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage. If the target is a creature, it can't regain hit points until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The handmaid has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Knife
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit 9 ({@damage 2d4 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Firebolt
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 7} to hit, range 120 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d10}) fire damage.

action.name: Fire Stream {@recharge 5}
entries: The handmaid lifts her lantern aloft, with a stream of fire emiting from it in a 30-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw, taking 33 ({@damage 6d10}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

monster.name: Headless Gargoyle

variant.name: Variant Gargoyle
entries: In Lothric Castle exist gargoyles with heads. These gargoyles use the headless gargoyle stat block with the following changes:

items: It has a challenge rating of 16 (15,000 XP)
It has 241 ({@dice 21d10 + 126}) hit points
It no longer has blindsight.
It gains darkvision of 60ft.
Its Multiattack makes three attacks, instead of two.

languages: understands Common and Giant but can't speak

trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: The gargoyle is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The gargoyle's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Varied Weaponry
entries: The gargoyle has different action options based on which weapon it wields: a fire lance or a great torch.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The gargoyle makes two attacks.

action.name: Fire Lance
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 2d12 + 7}) piercing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) fire damage.

action.name: Great Torch
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 4d6 + 7}) piercing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) fire damage.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the court sorcerer fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

action.name: Great Torch
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@dice 2d6 + 4}) plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage.

action.name: Soul Spear
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 10} to hit, range 120 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 6d6}) force damage.

action.name: Fire Spray {@recharge 4}
entries: The court sorcerer sprays flames from his Great torch in a 30-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw, taking 28 ({@damage 8d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary.name: Move
entries: The court sorcerer moves up to half his speed.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: The court sorcerer makes an attack with its great torch.

legendary.name: Homing Crystal Soul Mass (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The court sorcerer summons several darts of solidified magic. The next time a creature starts its turn within 5 feet of the sorcerer or enters within 5 feet of the sorcerer, it must succeed on a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw or take 17 ({@damage 5d6}) force damage.

trait.name: Eye Cluster
entries: The monstrosity has a cluster of eyes on its belly. Whenever a creature makes an attack against the monstrosity, they can choose to target the eye cluster. The attack is at disadvantage, and on a hit it is an automatic critical hit.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The monstrosity makes two slam attacks.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit 15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Gluttonous Grab {@recharge 4}
entries: The monstrosity attempts to grab and eat a Medium or smaller creature within 5 feet of it. The target must succeed on a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw or take 33 ({@damage 6d10}) bludgeoning damage plus 27 ({@damage 6d8}) acid damage. If this damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, they are eaten and digested by the monstrosity.

trait.name: Brute
entries: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when Yhorm hits with it (included in the attack).

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Yhorm fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

action.name: Great Machete
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}36 ({@damage 4d12 + 10}) slashing damage, plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage if Yhorm has fewer than half of his hit points remaining. If the target is a creature within 5 feet of Yhorm, he can choose to use two hands on the attack. On a hit, in addition to the normal damage, the target must also succeed on a {@dc 24} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

legendary.name: Move
entries: Yhorm moves up to half his speed.

legendary.name: Warcry
entries: Yhorm stomps his foot and lets out a thunderous warcry. Every Large or smaller creature within 10 feet of Yhorm must succeed on a {@dc 22} Dexterity saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}. Machete (Costs 2 Actions). Yhorm makes a one-handed attack with his great machete.

trait.name: Blade from the Deep (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: If the dancer starts her turn with fewer hit points than half her hit point maximum, she can use a bonus action to magically summon her ash blade to her hand with a burst of dark energy. Each creature within 10 feet of the dancer must make a {@dc 21} Constitution saving throw, taking 11 ({@damage 2d10}) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the dancer fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Sure-Footed
entries: The dancer has advantage on checks and saving throws to avoid being knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dancer makes two attacks with her flame blade. If she has her ash blade summoned and is wielding it, she can make an attack with her ash blade as a bonus action.

action.name: Flame Blade
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@dice 3d6 + 6}) magical slashing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage.

action.name: Ash Blade (Must Be Summoned)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@dice 3d6 + 6}) magical slashing damage plus 6 ({@damage 1d12}) force damage.

action.name: Dual Blade Dance {@recharge 5}
entries: The dancer twirls gracefully, spinning her blades about her as she moves up to her speed without provoking opportunity attacks. Each creature within 10 feet of the dancer at any point during this movement must make a {@dc 21} Dexterity saving throw, taking 27 ({@damage 6d6 + 6}) slashing damage, 14 ({@damage 4d6}) fire damage and 13 ({@damage 2d12}) force damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary.name: Move
entries: The dancer moves up to half her speed.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: The dancer makes a melee weapon attack.

legendary.name: Grab
entries: The dancer attempts to grapple a Medium or smaller creature within 5 feet of her. If she succeeds, the next time the dancer hits the {@condition grappled} target with an attack, it is a critical hit, and the grapple ends.

legendary.name: Erupting Ground Slices (Costs 2 Actions; Must Have Both Blades)
entries: The dancer slices her blades around her, creating erupting lines of fire and darkness. Each creature within 5 feet of the dancer must succeed on a {@dc 21} Dexterity saving throw or take 14 ({@damage 4d6}) fire damage plus 13 ({@damage 2d12}) necrotic damage.

legendary.name: Destructive Burst (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The dancer creates a burst of fire (or darkness if her ash blade is summoned) radiating out from her. Each creature within 15 feet of the dancer must make a {@dc 21} Dexterity saving throw, taking 33 ({@damage 6d10}) fire damage (or necrotic damage if her ash blade is summoned) on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting (3/Day)
headerEntries: The knight can innately cast holy weapon, requiring no material or verbal components. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom.

trait.name: Brave
entries: The knight has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition frightened}.

trait.name: Brute
entries: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the knight hits with it (included in the attack).

trait.name: Varied Weaponry
entries: The knight has different action options based on which weapon it wields: a longsword or a spear.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The knight makes two attacks.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) slashing damage, or 16 ({@damage 2d10 + 5}) slashing damage if wielded with two hands.

action.name: Lothric Spear
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) piercing damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting (3/Day)
headerEntries: The priest can innately cast mass cure wounds. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The priest makes three attacks with its sword.

action.name: Sword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Sacred Oath (5-6)
entries: The priest targets a willing humanoid within 30 feet of it. The target gains 15 temporary hit points and its weapon attacks deal an additional {@damage 1d4} damage. This effect lasts for 1 minute or until the priest's concentration is broken (as if concentrating on a spell).

trait.name: Overgrown Humanity
entries: If the wyven is reduced to 0 hit points, it doesn't die. Instead, a writhing black mass emerges from its body. This mass uses the pus of man statblock but has a movement speed of 0. When this mass is reduced to 0 hit points, the wyvern dies.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The wyvern makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit 17 ({@damage 2d10 + 6}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit 13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) slashing damage.

action.name: Fire Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The wyvern exhales fire in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 24} Dexterity saving throw, taking 70 ({@damage 20d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

variant.name: Variant Greater Hollow Soldier
entries: Some hollow soldiers use rudimentary explosives in their efforts to kill their enemies. Such hollows gain access to the firebomb action option.

entries.name: Firebomb ({@recharge 4})
entries: The soldier throws a small explosive up to 30 feet. Each creature within 5 feet of that point must succeed on a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw or take 14 ({@damage 4d6}) fire damage.

trait.name: Varied Weaponry
entries: The soldier has different action options based on which weapon it wields: a sword, a light crossbow, or a spear.
ACTIONS for Spear

trait.name: Multiattack
entries: The soldier makes two melee attacks.

trait.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage, or 7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage if wielded with two hands.
ACTIONS for Sword

trait.name: Multiattack
entries: The soldier makes two melee attacks.

trait.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) slashing damage, or 8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) slashing damage if wielded with two hands.
ACTIONS for Crossbow

trait.name: Heavy Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) piercing damage plus 5 ({@damage 2d4}) fire damage.

variant.name: Variant Greater Winged Knight
entries: Some winged knights make use of a pair of handaxes instead of a halberd. These winged knights use the winged knight stat block with the following changes:
Its Halberd action option is replaced with the following action options:

entries.name: Multiattack
entries: The knight makes two attacks with its handaxes.

entries.name: Handaxe
entries: {@atk m,r} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 feet or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 14 ({@damage 2d6 + 7}) slashing damage.

items: Its Spin action option affects creatures within 5 feet of it instead of within 10 feet of it.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The winged knight makes two attacks.

action.name: Halberd
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 2d10 + 7}) slashing damage.

action.name: Spin {@recharge 4}
entries: The knight spins around as it moves up to its speed in a straight path without provoking opportunity attacks. Each creature within 10 feet of the knight at any point during this movement must make a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw, taking 18 ({@damage 4d8}) slashing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Hidden Infection
entries: The pus can alter its appearance to be indistinguishable from an ordinary hollow. The process takes 1 hour. It can change back to its true form as a bonus action. While in hollow form, it uses the hollow stat block, though it has no equipment and retains this trait.

action.name: Thrash
entries: The pus thrashes wildly, attacking everything near it. Each creature within 10 feet of the pus must make a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw, taking 23 ({@damage 4d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d4 + 5}) piercing damage.

variant.name: Variant Greatsword Greater Cathedral Knight
entries: Some cathedral knights weild enourmous greatswords in place of a shield and mace. Such knights use the cathedral knight statblock with the following changes:
Its AC becomes 18 ({@item plate armor||plate})
It loses the Blessed Weapon bonus action.
It loses access to the Mace Attack, and gains access to the Greatsword attack.

entries.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 20 ({@damage 4d6 + 6}) slashing damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The knight makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Mace
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Heal {@recharge 5}
entries: The knight regains 30 hit points.

bonus.name: Blessed Weapon (Recharge 6)
entries: The knight blesses its mace with divine power for 1 minute. While blessed, the knight's mace deals an additional 7 ({@damage 2d6}) radiant damage.

walk.condition: (40 ft. if below half hit points)

trait.name: Bestial Regression (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: If Oceiros starts his turn with fewer hit points than half his hit point maximum, he lets out a bestial howl, dropping his staff and slamming his hands to the ground. He loses access to his staff and tail attacks, as well as the Pestilent Mist action, and gains access to his bite attack, the Charge and Pale Drake Breath actions, and his speed becomes 40 feet. These changes last until the end of his next short or long rest.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Oceiros fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Oceiros has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Oceiros makes two attacks: one with his staff and one with his tail.

action.name: Bite (Must Be Below Half Hit Points)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 3d10 + 5}) piercing damage.

action.name: Staff (Must Be Above Half Hit Points)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 3d6 + 5}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 20} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Tail (Must Be Above Half Hit Points)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 3d10 + 5}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Charge (Must Be Below Half Hit Points)
entries: Oceiros moves up to 40 feet in a straight line without provoking opportunity attacks. While moving in this way, he can move through other creature's space without being slowed. Creatures whose space he moves through must succeed on a {@dc 20} Dexterity saving throw or take 14 ({@damage 4d6}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Pestilent Mist {@recharge 5}
entries: Oceiros magically creates a deadly fine mist around himself. Each creatures within 20 feet of Oceiros must make a {@dc 21} Constitution saving throw, taking 77 ({@damage 14d10}) force damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Pale Drake Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The Oceiros breathes out magical crystals in a 60-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 21} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 84 ({@damage 13d12}) force damage and magically begins to turn to stone and is {@condition restrained}. It must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn. On a success, the effect ends. On a failure, the creature is {@condition petrified} until freed by the {@spell greater restoration} spell or other magic.
On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't otherwise affected.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: Oceiros makes a melee attack.

legendary.name: Detect
entries: Oceiros makes a Wisdom (Perception) check.

legendary.name: Spin (Costs 2 Actions; Must be Below Half Hit Points)
entries: Oceiros spins on the spot, striking creatures near him. Each creature within 5 feet of him must succeed on a {@dc 20} Dexterity saving throw or take 21 ({@damage 6d6}) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Brute
entries: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the grave warden hits with it (included in the attack).

trait.name: Unarmored Defense
entries: While the grave warden isn't wearing armor or wielding a shield it adds its Wisdom modifier to its AC (included in its AC).

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The grave warden makes three attacks with its twinblade. If it has a second twinblade drawn, it can make one additional attack with its twinblade.

action.name: Warden Twinblade
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) slashing damage.

trait.name: Fear of Fire
entries: If the starved hound takes fire damage, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Evasion
entries: If the starved hound is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The starved hound makes two bite attacks.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 2d4 + 4}) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Uncanny Dodge
entries: The starved hound halves the damage it takes from an attack.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The corvian makes three attacks with its greatknife, or two attacks with its scythe.

action.name: Greatknife
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Scythe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) slashing damage.

bonus.name: Winged Transformation (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: Wings burst out of the corvian's back. For the next minute, the corvian has a flying speed of 30 feet. If the corvian ends its turn in the air, it immediately falls.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The storyteller makes two attacks with its staff.

action.name: Staff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage or 8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage if wielded with two hands, plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) poison damage.

action.name: Poison Mist
entries: The storyteller releases poison gas in a 15-foot cube. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Fire Spray
entries: The storyteller releases a stream of fire in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 ({@damage 4d10}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

bonus.name: Winged Transformation (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: Wings burst out of the storyteller's back. For the next minute, the storyteller has a flying speed of 30 feet. If the storyteller ends its turn in the air, it immediately falls.

trait.name: Brute
entries: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when Gundyr hits with it (included in the attack).

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Gundyr fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Mighty Wielder
entries: Gundyr can wield a two-handed melee weapon in one hand and make attacks with it one-handed.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Gundyr makes two attacks, or three attacks if he has fewer hit points than half his hit point maximum. He can replace any of these attacks with a shove.

action.name: Halberd
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}24 ({@damage 3d10 + 8}) slashing damage.

action.name: Kick
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 3d8 + 8}) bludgeoning damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 23} Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 20 feet away from Gundyr and fall {@condition prone}.

action.name: Charge {@recharge 5}
entries: Gundyr holds his halberd before him and moves up to his speed in a straight line. Each Medium or smaller creature in that path must succeed on a {@dc 23} Dexterity saving throw or be moved with Gundyr, taking 15 ({@damage 2d6 + 8}) piercing damage for every 10 feet they are moved.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: Gundyr makes a melee attack.

legendary.name: Grab
entries: Gundyr attempts to grapple a Medium or smaller creature within 5 feet of him. If he succeeds, the next time Gundyr hits the {@condition grappled} target with an attack, it is a critical hit, and the grapple ends.

legendary.name: Stomp
entries: Gundyr stomps his foot, creating a small shockwave. Each creature within 5 feet of him must succeed on a {@dc 23} Dexterity saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

legendary.name: Lunging Attack (Costs 2 Actions; Must be Below Half Hit Points)
entries: Gundyr jumps up to 25 feet without provoking opportunity attacks before making an attack with his halberd with advantage on the attack roll.

trait.name: Brute
entries: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the armour hits with it (included in the attack).

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the armour fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Pilgrim Butterflies
entries: The dragonslayer armour is accompanied by two pilgrim butterflies. The butterflies use the commoner statblock, but are Huge monstrosities, have AC 13, 70 hit points, a flying speed of 30 feet, and can't take actions or REACTIONS, instead granting the armour access to the death rain legendary action option. The butterflies fly 100 feet above the dragonslayer armour at all times.
If both butterflies are killed or on a different plane to the armour, the armour loses access to the death rain legendary action option.
If the armour is killed, both pilgrim butterflies die as well.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The armour makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Dragonslayer Axe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}23 ({@dice 3d10 + 7}) magical slashing damage, or 26 ({@dice 3d12 + 7}) magical slashing damage if wielded with two hands, plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) lightning damage.

action.name: Shield Bash
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}20 ({@damage 3d8 + 7}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 21} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Falling Bolt {@recharge 5}
entries: The armour grasps its axe in its hands, lifting it aloft as it charges with lightning, before slamming it down on a foe. The armour makes a two-handed attack with its axe against a creature within reach. On a hit, the target takes an additional 27 ({@damage 6d8}) lightning damage. Hit or miss, a burst of lightning radiates out from the target. Each creature other than the armour within 10 feet of the target must make a {@dc 22} Dexterity saving throw, taking 27 ({@damage 6d8}) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

bonus.name: Shield Master
entries: The armour doffs or dons its shield.

legendary.name: Move
entries: The armour moves up to half its speed.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: The armour makes one melee weapon attack.

legendary.name: Shockwave (Costs 2 Actions; Must Be Below Half Hit Points)
entries: The armour slams its axe into the ground with two hands, before slicing it forwards, sending out a shockwave in a 60-foot line that is 10 feet wide. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 21} Dexterity saving throw, taking 35 ({@damage 10d6}) bludgeoning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary.name: Death Rain (Costs 3 Actions; Must Be Below Half Hit Points)
entries: The pilgrim butterflies puppeting the armour rain darkness-infused fire in a 30-foot radius, 100-foot-high cylinder centered on the dragonslayer armour. Each creature other than the armour in that area must succeed on a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw or take 27 ({@damage 6d8}) fire damage plus 27 ({@damage 6d8}) necrotic damage.

variant.name: Variant Thrall
entries: Some thralls are armed with a flamberge in place of their axes. These thralls lose access to the Multiattack and Thrall Axe action options, and gain the greatsword action option.

entries.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw}: {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d6+1}) slashing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The thrall has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the thrall's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The thrall makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Thrall Axe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) slashing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage.

action.name: Blowgun
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 30/90 ft., one target. {@h}5 piercing damage.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The scholar has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Wax Protection
entries: The scholar is immune to curses.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The scholar makes two attacks with its dagger.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Force Missile
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 8} to hit, range 100 ft., one target. {@h}23 ({@damage 4d8 + 5}) force damage.

action.name: Wax Burst
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}The target has its speed reduced by 5 feet for 1 minute. Each time the target is hit by this attack, its speed is reduced by a further 5 feet, to a minimum of 0.

action.name: Farron Hail {@recharge 4}
entries: The scholar releases several darts of force in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 22} Dexterity saving throw, taking 27 ({@damage 5d10}) force damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Evasion
entries: If Kamui is subjected to an effect that allows him to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, he instead takes no damage if he succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if he fails.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Kamui fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Standing Leap
entries: Kamui's long jump is up to 20 feet and his high jump is up to 10 feet, with or without a running start.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Kamui makes two attacks. If he has both of his swords drawn, he can make an additional sword attack.

action.name: Sword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@dice 1d8 + 6}) magical slashing damage.

action.name: Compound Bow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 14} to hit, range 100/420 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d6 + 6}) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute.

reaction.name: Uncanny Dodge
entries: Kamui halves the damage he takes from an attack.

legendary.name: Detect
entries: Kamui makes a Wisdom (Perception) check.

legendary.name: Move
entries: Kamui moves up to half his speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

legendary.name: Weapon Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Kamui makes a weapon attack.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the Daughter fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Daughter makes either three melee attacks-two with her rapier and one with her dagger-or uses Soul Spear twice.

action.name: Rapier
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) force damage.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Soul Spear
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 11} to hit, range 120 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 6d6}) force damage.

action.name: Crystal Hail {@recharge 5}
entries: The Daughter creates a ball of magical crystals, which rains down around a point she can see within 100 feet of her. Each creature within 60 feet of that point must succeed on a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw or take 33 ({@damage 6d10}) force damage.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: The Daughter makes an attack with her rapier.

legendary.name: Move
entries: The daughter moves up to half her speed.

legendary.name: Homing Crystal Soul Mass (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The Daughter summons several darts of solidified magic. The next time a creature starts its turn within 5 feet of the Daughter or enters within 5 feet of the Daughter, it must succeed on a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw or take 17 ({@damage 5d6}) force damage.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Albert fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Mighty Wielder
entries: Albert can wield a two-handed melee weapon in one hand and make attacks with it one-handed. If the attack is made with a weapon sized for a Large creature (such as his Large Greataxe), the one-handed attack is made at disadvantage.

trait.name: Outsize Strength
entries: Albert can use weapons sized for Large creatures with two hands without disadvantage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Albert makes two attacks.

action.name: Large Greataxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 2d12 + 6}) slashing damage.

bonus.name: Shield Master
entries: Albert doffs or dons his shield.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: Albert adds 4 to his AC against one attack that would hit him. To do so, albert must see the attacker and be wielding his shield.

legendary.name: Detect
entries: Albert makes a Wisdom (Perception) check.

legendary.name: Move
entries: Albert moves up to half his speed.

legendary.name: Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Albert makes one attack with his large greataxe.

variant.name: Variant Ascended Winged Knight
entries: Some ascended winged knights make use of a pair of handaxes instead of a halberd. These winged knights use the winged knight stat block with the following changes:

items: Its Halberd action option is replaced with the following action option:

items.name: Handaxe
entries: {@atk m,rw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 5 feet or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 3d6 + 8}) slashing damage.

trait.name: Brute
entries: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the winged knight hits with it (included in the attack).

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The winged knight makes two attacks.

action.name: Halberd
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}24 ({@damage 3d10 + 8}) slashing damage.

action.name: Divine Pillars of Light {@recharge 5}
entries: The winged knight levitates slightly as it summons beams of divine light from below it. Each creature of its choice within 30 feet of the winged knight must succeed on a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw or take 35 ({@damage 10d6}) radiant damage.

trait.name: Brotherly Protection
entries: Lothric can ride on Lorian's back as if Lorian were one size larger. While riding Lorian, Lothric has three-quarters cover, automatically succeeds on saving throws, and attacks against Lothric have disadvantage.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Lorian fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Mighty Wielder
entries: Lorian can wield a two-handed melee weapon in one hand and make attacks with it one-handed.

trait.name: Twin Soul
entries: While Lothric is still alive, Lorian can't die or be destroyed. Instead, if an attack or effect reduces Lorian to 0 hit points, or he is targeted by an effect that would instantly kill him, he is reduced to 0 hit points and is {@condition unconscious} but stabilised. If Lothric dies, Lorian dies as well.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Lorian makes two attacks with his greatsword.

action.name: Lorian's Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}29 ({@dice 6d6 + 8}) magical slashing damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) fire damage.

action.name: Holy Flame Beam {@recharge 5}
entries: Lorian lifts his blade aloft, charging it with holy energy before slamming the sword down, releasing a radiant energy in a 100-foot line that is 10 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw, taking 45 ({@damage 10d8}) radiant damage plus 22 ({@damage 5d8}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary.name: Teleport
entries: Lorian magically teleports up to 90 feet that he can see. If Lothric is on his back, Lorian brings him as well.

legendary.name: Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Lorian makes one melee weapon attack.

legendary.name: Flame Wave (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Lorian grasps his greatsword in two hands, swinging it forwards to create a 15-foot cone of fire. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 ({@damage 4d10}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Sibling Teleport
entries: If Lothric starts his turn in a different space than Lorian, he can use a bonus action to magically teleport onto Lorian's back.

action.name: Magic Homing Arrow
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 13} to hit, range 120 ft., one target. {@h}56 ({@damage 16d6}) radiant damage.

action.name: Magic Homing Projectiles
entries: Lothric releases a large number of magical projectiles, which home in on hostile creatures. Each creature hostile to Lothric within 120 feet of him must make a {@dc 21} Dexterity saving throw, taking 28 ({@damage 8d6}) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Revive
entries: If Lorian is within 5 feet of Lothric and {@condition unconscious}, Lothric restores up to 200 hit points to Lorian.

variant.name: Variant Serpent-Man
entries: Some of the serpent-men arm themselves not with knives, but shotels and shields, from small round bucklers to large greatshields painted in symbols of the archdragons. These serpent-men use the serpent-man statistics with the following changes:

items: It has a challenge rating of 10 (5,900 XP)
Its armor class is 19 (natural armor, shield)
It loses access to the Knives action option, and gains access to the Shotel action option:

items.name: Shotel
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 feet, one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8+5}) slashing damage.

items: Its Multiattack becomes:

items.name: Mutliattack
entries: The man-drake makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its shotel.

trait.name: Brute
entries: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the serpent-man hits with it (included in the attack).

trait.name: Standing Leap
entries: The serpent-man's long jump is up to 20 feet and its high jump is up to 10 feet, with or without a running start.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The serpent-man makes three attacks: two attacks with its knife and one with its bite. If it has both of its knives drawn, it can make an additional knife attack.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) piercing damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) poison damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature it must succeed on a {@dc 17} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Knife
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d4 + 5}) slashing damage.

action.name: Fire Spit
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 8} to hit, range 120 feet, one target. {@h}22 ({@damage 4d10}) fire damage.

trait.name: Brute
entries: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the serpent-man hits with it (included in the attack).

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The serpent-man makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Chain Greataxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}26 ({@damage 3d12 + 7}) slashing damage.

action.name: Fire Breath {@recharge}
entries: The serpent-man breaths fire in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw, taking 49 ({@damage 14d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the Ancient Wyvern fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Vulnerable Head
entries: When a creature targets the Ancient Wyvern with an attack, they can choose to target its head. The attack is made with disadvantage, and the Ancient Wyvern has vulnerability to all damage it takes in this way. If the attack is a critical hit, the Ancient Wyvern is instantly killed.

action.name: Stomp
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}30 ({@damage 4d10 + 8}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}22 ({@damage 4d6 + 8}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Fire Breath
entries: The Ancient Wyvern exhales fire in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 24} Dexterity saving throw, taking 91 ({@damage 26d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary.name: Detect
entries: The wyvern makes a Wisdom (Perception) check.

legendary.name: Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The wyvern makes an attack.

legendary.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The Ancient Wyvern beats its wings. Each creature within 15 feet of the Ancient Wyvern must succeed on a {@dc 23} Dexterity saving throw or take 15 ({@damage 2d6 + 8}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Stable
entries: The rock lizard has advantage on checks and saving throws to avoid being pushed or knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d8 + 6}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Roll
entries: The rock lizard rolls up to 60 feet, ignoring difficult terrain. If a creature is in the rock lizard's path, the creature must make a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 13 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) bludgeoning damage for every 10 feet the rock lizard has rolled and is knocked {@condition prone}, and the rock lizard stops rolling. On a successful save, the target takes no damage and the rock lizard is able to continue rolling through its space.

action.name: Fire Breath {@recharge 4}
entries: The rock lizard exhales fire in a 15-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a {@dc 18} saving throw, taking 28 ({@damage 8d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the ricard knight fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The knight makes three attacks.

action.name: Drakeblood Sword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 1d8 + 7}) slashing damage, or 12 ({@damage 1d10 + 7}) slashing damage if wielded with two hands, plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) lightning damage while Lightning Blade is active.

bonus.name: Lightning Blade (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The knight imbues its weapon with lightning for 1 minute. While imbued, the knight's weapon deals an additional 3 ({@damage 1d6}) lightning damage.

bonus.name: Shield Master
entries: The knight doffs or dons its shield.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: The knight makes an attack with its Drakeblood Sword.

legendary.name: Detect
entries: The knight makes a Wisdom (Perception) check.

legendary.name: Move
entries: The knight moves up to half its speed.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The serpent-man has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Staff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage, or 7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands

action.name: Firebolt
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 7} to hit, range 120 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d10}) fire damage.

action.name: Homing Soul Mass
entries: The serpent-man summons several darts of solidified magic. The next time a creature starts its turn within 5 feet of the man-drake or enters within 5 feet of the serpent-man, it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw or take 17 ({@damage 5d6}) force damage.

action.name: Summon Warrior
entries: The man-drake rings its bell to magically summon one warrior in an unoccupied space within 120 feet of it: either the drakeblood knight or ricard knight. The summoned warrior is an ally of the serpent-man and lasts until reduced to 0 hit points.
The serpent-man can only have one warrior summoned at a time.

trait.name: Unarmored Defense
entries: While the ricard knight isn't wearing armor or wielding a shield, it adds its Wisdom modifier to its AC (included in his AC).

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the ricard knight fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The ricard knight makes three attacks with his rapier.

action.name: Rapier
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 1d8 + 7}) piercing damage.

action.name: Ricard Flourish {@recharge 4}
entries: The ricard knight makes 6 attacks with his rapier against a single target within reach.

legendary.name: Detect
entries: The ricard knight makes a Wisdom (Perception) check.

legendary.name: Move
entries: The ricard knight moves up to half his speed.

legendary.name: Flurry (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The ricard knight uses his multiattack.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the havel knight fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The havel knight maks two attacks.

action.name: Dragon Tooth
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}25 ({@damage 5d6 + 8}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 22} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone} and {@condition incapacitated} until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Stone Flesh {@recharge 5}
entries: The havel knight magically coats itself in stone, gaining 60 temporary hit points. While these temporary hit points last, the havel knight can't take the Dash or Dodge action, and is immune to being {@condition incapacitated}, knocked {@condition prone}, pushed, pulled, or {@condition stunned}.

legendary.name: Detect
entries: The havel knight makes a Wisdom (Perception) check.

legendary.name: Move
entries: The havel knight moves up to half its speed.

legendary.name: Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The havel knight makes one attack with its Dragon Tooth.

trait.name: Soul Absorption (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: If the King of Storms is reduced to 0 hit points or targeted by an effect that would instantly kill or destroy it, it is not knocked {@condition unconscious}, killed, or destroyed. Instead, the mount dies, with the rider absorbing its soul, transforming into the Nameless King. Its initiative count doesn't change.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the King of Storms fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Flyby
entries: The King of Storms doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

trait.name: Two as One
entries: The King of Storms is a single creature, composed of a rider and its mount, who are inseperable as long as the King of Storms has at least 1 hit point. Additionally, the King of Storms has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks and on saving throws against being {@condition blinded}, {@condition charmed}, {@condition deafened}, {@condition frightened}, {@condition stunned}, and knocked {@condition unconscious}.

action.name: Dragonslayer Swordspear
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 2d12 + 8}) slashing damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) lightning damage.

action.name: Sunlight Spear
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 13} to hit, range 120 ft., one target. {@h}35 ({@damage 10d6}) lightning damage.

action.name: Fire Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The King of Storms exhales fire in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 22} Dexterity saving throw, taking 63 ({@damage 18d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: The King of Storms makes a melee attack.

legendary.name: Move
entries: The King of Storms moves up to half its fly speed.

legendary.name: Falling Bolt (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The King of Storms grasps its swordspear in its hands, lifting it aloft as it charges with lightning, before slamming it down on a foe. The King of Storms makes an attack with its swordspear against a creature within reach. On a hit, the target takes damage as normal. Hit or miss, a burst of lightning radiates out from the target. Each creature other than the King of Storms within 10 feet of the target must make a {@dc 21} Dexterity saving throw, taking 17 ({@damage 7d4}) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (2/Day)
entries: If the Nameless King fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Wind Ward
entries: The Nameless king is surrounded by a whirling aura of wind. Ranged weapon attacks agains the Nameless King have disadvantage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Nameless King makes two attacks with his swordspear.

action.name: Dragonslayer Swordspear
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 2d12 + 8}) slashing damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) lightning damage.

action.name: Lightning Strike
entries: The Nameless King holds his swordspear aloft, calling lightning down onto a point within 120 ft. of him that he can see. Each creature within 5 feet of that point must make a {@dc 23} Dexterity saving throw, taking 33 ({@damage 6d10}) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Swordspear Thrust {@recharge 5}
entries: The Nameless king moves up to 30 feet without provoking opportunity attacks and makes an attack with its dragonslayer swordspear against a Medium or smaller creature within reach. On a hit, the target takes an additional 36 ({@damage 8d8}) lightning damage and is thrown up to 30 feet, landing {@condition prone}.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: The Nameless King makes an attack with his swordspear.

legendary.name: Shockwave
entries: The Nameless King swings his swordspear, gererating a shockwave in a 90-foot line that is 10 feet wide. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 23} Dexterity saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

legendary.name: Falling Bolt (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The Nameless King grasps his swordspear in his hands, lifting it aloft as he charges with lightning, before slamming it down on a foe. The Nameless King makes an attack with his swordspear against a creature within reach. On a hit, the target takes damage as normal. Hit or miss, a burst of lightning radiates out from the target. Each creature other than the King of Storms within 20 feet of the target must succeed on a {@dc 23} Dexterity saving throw or take 17 ({@damage 7d4}) lightning damage.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day in this form)
entries: If the Soul of Cinder fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The Soul of Cinder's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Old Gods of Lordran (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: If the Soul of Cinder is reduced to 0 hit points or targeted by an effect that would instantly kill or destroy it, it is not knocked {@condition unconscious}, killed, or destroyed. Instead, it stabs its coiled sword into the ground, instantly transforming into its second form in a fiery explosion. Its initiative count doesn't change. Each creature within 10 feet of the Soul of Cinder when this ability is activated must succeed on a {@dc 23} Dexterity saving throw or take 18 ({@damage 4d8}) fire damage and be knocked {@condition prone}.

bonus.name: Coiled Sword
entries: The Soul of Cinder weilds a coiled sword, and can use a bonus action to change the sword's form: it can be a curved sword, a longsword, a spear, or a staff. Each form of the sword gives the Soul of Cinder access to different action options and different legendary action options.

legendary.name: Detect
entries: The Soul of Cinder makes a Wisdom (Perception) check.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (2/Day in this form)
entries: If the Soul of Cinder fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The Soul of Cinder's weapon attacks are magical.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Soul of Cinder makes two greatsword attacks.

action.name: Coiled Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 18} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}24 ({@damage 4d6 + 10}) slashing damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) fire damage.

action.name: Sunlight Spear
entries: {@atk ms,rs} {@hit 18} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 150 ft., one target. {@h}44 ({@damage 8d10}) lightning damage.

action.name: Grab
entries: The Soul of Cinder attempts to grab and incinerate a Medium or smaller creature within 5 feet of it. The target must succeed on a {@dc 26} Dexterity saving throw or take 66 ({@damage 12d10}) fire damage and be thrown up to 30 feet away from the Soul of Cinder, landing {@condition prone}.

action.name: Lord of Cinder {@recharge 5}
entries: The Soul of Cinder causes large flames to erupt from its greatsword, extending its reach, before making five rapid swings around it. Each creature within 15 feet of the Soul of Cinder must make a {@dc 26} Dexterity saving throw, taking 70 ({@damage 20d6}) slashing damage and 70 ({@damage 20d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary.name: Detect
entries: The Soul of Cinder makes a Wisdom (Perception) check.

legendary.name: Move
entries: The Soul of Cinder moves up to its speed.

legendary.name: Sunlight Spear (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The Soul of Cinder uses Sunlight Spear.

legendary.name: Spear Storm (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The Soul of Cinder hurls a bolt of lightning into the sky, causing multiple bolts to rain down around a point it can see within 150 feet of it. Each creature within 15 feet of that point must make a {@dc 26} Dexterity saving throw, taking 33 ({@damage 6d10}) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Brute
entries: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the follower hits with it (included in the attack).

trait.name: Varied Weaponry
entries: The follower has different action options based on which weapon it wields: sabre and torch, spear, or torch.
ACTIONS For Sabre and Torch

trait.name: Multiattack
entries: The follower makes four attacks: two with its sabre and two with its torch.

trait.name: Sabre
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) slashing damage.

trait.name: Torch
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d4 + 6}) fire damage.
ACTIONS For Spear

trait.name: Multiattack
entries: The follower makes three attacks with its spear.

trait.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) piercing damage, or 15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) piercing damage if wielded with two hands. If the spear is thrown, it immediately returns to the followers hands.
ACTIONS For Torch

trait.name: Multiattack
entries: The follower makes three attacks with its torch.

trait.name: Torch
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d4 + 6}) fire damage.

trait.name: Fire Spray {@recharge 5}
entries: The follower spews fire in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw, taking 39 ({@damage 6d12}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the tree woman remains motionless, she is indistinguishable from a normal tree.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The tree woman makes three slam attacks.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 3d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Homing Flame
entries: The tree woman releases a mass of flaming motes at a target she can see within 120 feet of her. The target must make a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw, taking 49 ({@damage 9d10}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Frost Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The tree woman breathes out a frostbitten breath in a 45-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 35 ({@damage 10d6}) cold damage and is slowed as per the {@spell slow} spell for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't slowed.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
entries: The wolf has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The wolf has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the wolf's allies is within 5 ft. of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The wolf makes two bite attacks.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 16} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Soul Arrow
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 7} to hit, range 60 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 3d6}) force damage.

trait.name: Varied Weaponry
entries: The corvian knight has different action options based on which weapon it wields: a rapier or crow talons.
ACTIONS For Rapier

trait.name: Multiattack
entries: The corvian knight makes four attacks with its rapier or five attacks with its darts.

trait.name: Rapier
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Dart
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 11} to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d4 + 6}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Peck {@recharge 5}
entries: The corvian knight leaps onto the shoulders of a Medium or smaller creature and pecks at it with its beak. The target must succeed on a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw or take 66 ({@damage 12d10}) piercing damage.
ACTIONS For Crow Talons

trait.name: Multiattack
entries: The corvian knight makes four attacks with its crow talons.

trait.name: Crow Talons
entries: {@atk mw} +11 ot hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) slashing damage.

trait.name: Peck {@recharge 5}
entries: The corvian knight leaps onto the shoulders of a Medium or smaller creature and pecks at it with its beak. The target must succeed on a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw or take 66 ({@damage 12d10}) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Slow Fall
entries: The corvian knight reduces the damage it takes from falling by 40 points of damage.

variant.name: Variant Millwood Knight
entries: Some Millwood knights use an axe and shield instead of the Quakstone Hammer. These knights use the millwood knight statistics with the following changes:

items: It has a challenge rating of 11 (7,200 XP)
Its armor class is 20 (plate, shield)
It loses access to the Quakestone Hammer and Quake action options, and gains access to the Battleaxe action option:

items.name: Battleaxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 5 feet, one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d8+8}) slashing damage, or 19 ({@damage 2d10 + 8}) slashing damage if wielded with two hands.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The millwood knight makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Quakestone Hammer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}22 ({@damage 4d6 + 8}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Millwood Greatbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 13} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d8 + 8}) piercing damage. Hit or miss, all creatures within 10 feet of the target (including the target) must make a {@dc 21} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 11 ({@damage 2d10}) thunder damage and is knocked {@condition prone}.
On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Quake {@recharge 5}
entries: The millwood knight slams his hammer into the ground before wrenching it out, creating a small shockwave. Each creature within 15 feet of the millwood knight must make a {@dc 21} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes 42 ({@damage 12d6}) thunder damage and is knocked {@condition prone}.
On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage and isn't knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Brute
entries: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the millwood chieftain hits with it (included in the attack).

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The millwood chieftan makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Earth Seeker
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}28 ({@damage 3d12 + 9}) slashing damage.

action.name: Earthen Wrath {@recharge 5}
entries: The millwood chieftan slams his axe into the ground before wrenching it out, creating a small shockwave. Each creature on the ground within 90 feet of the millwood chieftan must make a {@dc 22} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes 42 ({@damage 12d6}) thunder damage, is knocked {@condition prone}, and {@condition stunned} until the end of its next turn.
On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage and isn't knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Eater of Rot
entries: The giant fly has advantage on saving throws against poison or disease.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The giant fly can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature other than a construct or undead, they are also covered in maggots. While these maggots cover them, a creature loses 13 ({@dice 3d8}) hit points at the start of each of its turns due to blood loss. A creature can scrape the maggots off as an action. The maggots also fall off if the creature takes fire damage or holds a lit torch.

Puke maggots (Recharge 5-6). The giant fly vomits maggots at a creature within 10 feet of it. The target must succeed on a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw or be covered in maggots. While these maggots cover them, a creature loses 27 ({@dice 6d8}) hit points at the start of each of its turns due to blood loss. A creature can scrape the maggots off as an action. The maggots also fall off if the creature takes fire damage or holds a lit torch. Constructs and undead are immune to these maggots.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Sir Vilhelm fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Sir Vilhelm makes two attacks with his onyx blade. He can use his Life Drain in place of one onyx blade attack.

action.name: Onyx Blade
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@dice 1d8 + 6}) magical slashing damage, or 11 ({@dice 1d10 + 6}) magaical slashing damage if wielded with two hands, plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) necrotic damage while Elfirede's Darkflame is active.

action.name: Life Drain
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 6d6}) necrotic damage, and Sir Vilhelm regains hit points equal to half the necrotic damage taken.

action.name: Vow of Silence {@recharge}
entries: Sir Vilhelm magically marks all creatures within 30 feet of him (including himself) for 1 minute. Each creature marked in this way can't cast spells or concentrate on spells (Sir Vilhelm can still use Life Drain but loses access to his Heal legendary action option and this action option while this mark lasts).

bonus.name: Dark Hand
entries: Sir Vilhelm magically gains a +2 bonus to AC. This bonus lasts until he makes an attack, is {@condition incapacitated}, or chooses to end it (no action required).

bonus.name: Elfriede's Darkflame
entries: Sir Vilhelm ignites his Onyx Blade with black flames for 1 minute. While these flames last, his Onyx Blade deals an additonal 10 ({@damage 3d6}) necrotic damage on a hit (included in the attack).

legendary.name: Attack
entries: Sir Wilhelm makes an attack with his onyx blade or uses his Life Drain.

legendary.name: Detect
entries: Sir Wilhelm makes a Wisdom (Perception) check.

legendary.name: Heal (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Sir Wilhelm magically regains up to 60 hit points.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
entries: The Greatwolf has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the Greatwolf fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Greatwolf makes two bite attacks.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 3d8 + 7}) piercing damage, plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) cold damage if the Greatwolf has fewer than half of its hit points remaining.

action.name: Frost Breath
entries: The Greatwolf breaths freezing air in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 20} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 49 ({@damage 9d10}) cold damage and is slowed for 1 minute. While slowed in this way, a creature can only take an action or a bonus action, not both, and can only make one attack per turn. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't slowed.

legendary.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 3d6 + 7}) bludgeoning damage.

legendary.name: Bite (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The Greatwolf makes a bite attack.

legendary.name: Charge (Costs 2 Actions; Must Be Below Half Hit Points)
entries: The Greatwolf moves up to 40 feet in a straight line without provoking opportunity attacks. While moving in this way, it can move through other creatures' spaces without being slowed. Each creature whose space it moves through must succeed on a {@dc 21} Dexterity saving throw or take 9 ({@damage 2d8}) bludgeoning damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) cold damage.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (2/Day)
entries: If the Gravetender fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The gravetender makes three attacks, only one of which can be a shield attack.

action.name: Valorheart Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@dice 1d6 + 8}) magical slashing damage.

action.name: Valorheart Shield
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@dice 1d4 + 8}) magical bludgeoning damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition stunned} until the end of the gravetender's next turn.

reaction.name: Block
entries: The Gravetender adds 5 to his AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the Gravetender must see the attacker and be wielding its shield.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: The Gravetender makes an attack with his shortsword.

legendary.name: Detect
entries: The Gravetender makes a Wisdom (Perception) check.

legendary.name: Move
entries: The Gravetender moves up to half its speed.

trait.name: Father Ariandel (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: When Friede is reduced to 0 hit points or targeted by an effect that would instantly kill or destroy her, she isn't knocked {@condition unconscious}, killed, or destroyed. Instead, she loses access to her legendary actions and Father Ariandel appears within 15 feet of her and rolls his own initiative. Any damage she takes after this point is taken by Father Ariandel instead. Once Father Ariandel is killed, Friede falls {@condition unconscious} and is immune to all damage until the start of her next turn, at which point she instantly transforms into Blackflame Elfriede and is no longer {@condition unconscious}. Her initiative count doesn't change.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (2/Day)
entries: If Friede fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Friede makes two attacks with her enchanted scythe.

action.name: Enchanted Scythe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@dice 1d8 + 7}) magical slashing damage plus 13 ({@damage 3d8}) force damage.

action.name: Heal
entries: Friede heals 50 hit points to Father Ariandel. To use this action, Friede and Father Ariandel must be on the same plane.

action.name: Invisible Leap
entries: Friede turns {@condition invisible} before jumping up to a distance equal to her speed. Creatures within 5 feet of Friede after this jump can see through this invisibility. This invisibility lasts until the end of her next turn or if Friede makes an attack. If Friede hits with an attack that ends this invisibility, the attack is a critical hit.

action.name: Frost Swing {@recharge 5}
entries: Friede swings her scythe, creating ice crystals in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 35 ({@damage 10d6}) cold damage, is knocked {@condition prone}, and is slowed for 1 minute. While slowed in this way, a creature can only take an action or a bonus action, not both, and can only make one attack per turn. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage, isn't knocked {@condition prone}, and isn't slowed.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: Friede makes an attack with her enchanted scythe.

legendary.name: Move
entries: Friede moves up to half her speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Ariandel makes two attacks with his bowl.

action.name: Bowl
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 3d8 + 7}) bludgeoning damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage.

action.name: Pour Fire {@recharge 5}
entries: Ariandel pours fire from his bowl in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw, taking 36 ({@damage 8d8}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Elfriede fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Elfriede makes two attacks: one with her enchanted scythe and one with her frostbite scythe.

action.name: Enchanted Scythe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@dice 1d8 + 7}) magical slashing damage plus 13 ({@damage 3d8}) force damage.

action.name: Frostbite Scythe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@dice 1d8 + 7}) magical slashing damage plus 16 ({@damage 3d10}) cold damage.

action.name: Invisible Leap
entries: Elfriede turns {@condition invisible} before jumping up to a distance equal to her speed. Creatures within 5 feet of Elfriede after this jump can see through this invisibility. This invisibility lasts until the end of her next turn or if Elfriede makes an attack. If Elfriede hits with an attack that ends this invisibility, the attack is a critical hit.

action.name: Blackflame Leap {@recharge 5}
entries: Elfriede jumps up to 40 feet without provoking opportunity attacks, releasing an explosion of black flames as she lands. Each other creature within 15 feet of where she lands must make a {@dc 21} Dexterity saving throw, taking 44 ({@damage 8d10}) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: Elfriede makes an attack with her enchanted scythe.

legendary.name: Move
entries: Elfriede moves up to half her speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

legendary.name: Blackflame Snake (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Elfriede sends a thin wave of black flames at a creature on the ground she can see within 60 feet of her. The target must succeed on a {@dc 21} Dexterity saving throw or take 45 ({@damage 10d8}) necrotic damage.

legendary.name: Frost Swing (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Elfriede swings her scythe, creating ice crystals in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw or take 35 ({@damage 10d6}) cold damage, be knocked {@condition prone}, and be slowed for 1 minute. While slowed in this way, a creature can only take an action or a bonus action, not both, and can only make one attack per turn. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Wicked Sickle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d4 + 5}) slashing damage.

action.name: Great Soul Dreg
entries: The murkman transforms into a Large black shape and flies up to 90 feet in a straight line without provoking opportunity attacks. While moving in this way, it can move through other creatures' spaces without being slowed. Each creature whose space it moves through must succeed on a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw or take 44 ({@damage 8d10}) necrotic damage. At the end of this movement, the murkman dies.

action.name: Bury Alive {@recharge}
entries: The murkman attempts to drag a Medium or smaller creature into the ground. The target must make a {@dc 16} Strength saving throw, taking 52 ({@damage 8d12}) bludgeoning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If this damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, it is dragged 4 feet below ground and is suffocating. While buried, the target has total cover, is heavily obscured, and must be unearthed to stop suffocating.

action.name: Staff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Deep Soul
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 6} to hit, range 60 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 6d6}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Summon Murkman
entries: The murkman summoner magically summons {@dice 1d6} murkmen. These murkmen are allied with the summoner, roll their own initiative, and last until reduced to 0 hit points. While these murkmen last, the summoner can't use this action again.

trait.name: Divine Form
entries: If the angel is reduced to 0 hit points, it fades into light and is destroyed.

trait.name: Tree-Like Pilgrim
entries: While the tree-like pilgrim remains alive, a destroyed angel gains a new body after 1 minute, regaining all its hit points and becoming active again. The new body appears within 10 feet of where the angel was destroyed.
The tree-like pilgrim uses the statistics of a commoner, but can take no actions, has 100 hit points and a movement speed of 0.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The angel uses Divine Ray six times.

action.name: Divine Ray
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 13} to hit, range 500 ft., one target. {@h}25 ({@damage 4d8 + 7}) radiant damage.

trait.name: Brute
entries: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the harald legion knight hits with it (included in the attack).

trait.name: Vulnerable Head
entries: Once per turn, a creature can strike at the black mass the harald legion knight has for a head. The attack is at disadvantage, and must be a ranged attack or be made with a melee weapon that can reach its head and that deals piercing damage. On a hit, the attack is a critical hit.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The harald legion knight makes three attacks. It can replace one of these attacks with a use of its Leap And Slam.

action.name: Curved Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}25 ({@damage 5d6 + 8}) slashing damage.

action.name: Leap And Slam
entries: The harald legion knight leaps up to 30 feet and makes an attack with its greatsword against a target within reach. On a hit, the target takes an additional 17 ({@damage 5d6}) slashing damage and must succeed on a {@dc 22} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Brave
entries: The knight has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition frightened}.

trait.name: Brute
entries: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the knight hits with it (included in the attack).

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The knight makes two attacks.

action.name: Lothric Banner
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) slashing damage, or 15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) slashing damage if wielded with two hands.

action.name: Present Banner {@recharge 5}
entries: The knight raises its banner, blessing creatures of its choice within 10 feet of it. Each target gains the benefits of the {@spell bless} spell for 1 minute.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Zoey fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Whip Master
entries: Zoey deals an additional 10 ({@damage 3d6}) damage when she hits with a whip (included in the attack).

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Zoey makes three attacks with her whip or uses Fire Orb twice.

action.name: Whip
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 1d4 + 3d6 + 6}) slashing damage.

action.name: Fire Orb
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 14} to hit, range 60 ft., one target. {@h}31 ({@damage 9d6}) fire damage.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: Zoey makes one attack with her whip.

legendary.name: Flame Fan
entries: Zoey generates a large fan of flame and swings it at a target within 5 feet. The target must succeed on a {@dc 22} Dexterity saving throw or take 21 ({@damage 6d6}) fire damage.

monster.name: Demon in Pain / Demon from Below
languages: understands Abyssal and Common but can't speak

trait.name: Heir to Chaos (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: The Demon In Pain and the Demon From Below are magically linked. If the other demon is dead and this demon is reduced to 0 hit points or targeted by an effect that would instantly kill or destroy it, it isn't killed or destroyed. Instead, it falls {@condition unconscious} and is immune to all damage until the start of its next turn, at which point it instantly transforms into the Demon Prince and is no longer {@condition unconscious}. Each creature within 10 feet of the demon when it transforms must succeed on a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw or take 13 ({@damage 3d8}) fire damage. Its initiative count doesn't change.

trait.name: Multiple Forms
entries: The demon has two forms:

trait.name: Flaming Form
entries: The demon is alight with internal flame.
Burnt Form The demon is extinguished.
ACTIONS for Flaming Form

trait.name: Multiattack
entries: The demon makes three attacks, only one of which can be a Flaming Smash.

trait.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 3d6 + 7}) slashing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage.

trait.name: Flaming Smash
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 3d6 + 7}) bludgeoning damage. Hit or miss, the target and each creature other than the demon within 15 feet of the target must make a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw, taking 17 ({@damage 5d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The demon then switches to its Burnt Form.
ACTIONS for Burnt Form

trait.name: Multiattack
entries: The demon uses its breath weapon or makes one claw attack. it can then use the Change Form action.

trait.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 3d6 + 7}) slashing damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) poison damage.

trait.name: Change Forms
entries: The demon switches to its Flaming Form.

trait.name: Breath Weapon
entries: The demon uses one of the following breath weapons.

trait.name: Poison Beam
entries: The demon breathes a beam of poison in a 120-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw, taking 40 ({@damage 9d8}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Toxic Breath
