entries: The demon exhales toxic sludge in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 19} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 35 ({@damage 10d6}) poison damage and is {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition poisoned}.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the Demon Prince fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The Demon Prince has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Varied Forms
entries: The Demon Prince comes in two forms, depending on which demon it transformed from:

trait.name: Demon In Pain Form
entries: The Demon Prince transformed from the Demon In Pain.

trait.name: Demon From Below Form
entries: The Demon Prince transformed from the Demon From Below.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Demon Prince makes two claw attacks.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 3d6 + 8}) slashing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage.

action.name: Fireball
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 14} to hit, range 120 ft., one target. {@h}31 ({@damage 9d6}) fire damage. If the target is on the ground, lava fills a 5-foot-diameter space centred on the target until the start of the Demon Prince's next turn. If a creature ends its turn in that area, it takes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) fire damage.

action.name: Varied Form Offense {@recharge}
entries: The Demon Prince uses one of the following actions, depending on whether it transformed from the Demon In Pain or the Demon From Below:

action.name: Flame Beam (Demon In Pain Form)
entries: The Demon Prince breathes a beam of condensed flame in a 150-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a {@dc 22} Dexterity saving throw, taking 91 ({@damage 26d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Meteor Shower (Demon From Below Form)
entries: The Demon Prince generates an enourmous ball of flame, which breaks into chunks that rain down at a point it can see within 150 feet of it. Each creature within 60 feet of that point must make a {@dc 22} Dexterity saving throw, taking 45 ({@damage 13d6}) bludgeoning damage and 45 ({@damage 13d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary.name: Fire Snake
entries: The Demon Prince sends a thin wave of black flames at a creature it can see on the ground within 60 feet of it. The target must succeed on a {@dc 22} Dexterity saving throw or take 22 ({@damage 5d8}) fire damage.

legendary.name: Claw
entries: The Demon Prince makes a claw attack.

legendary.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The Demon Prince beats its wings. Each creature within 15 feet of the Demon Prince must succeed on a {@dc 23} Dexterity saving throw or take 15 ({@damage 2d6 + 8}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}. The Demon Prince can then fly up to half its flying speed.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 3d6 + 7}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Summons
entries: The judicator cries out as it summons a number of spectral figures. The effect of the summons varies depending on the summoned figures, and the figures disappear immediately after acting. The figures are otherwise immune to damage and all conditions.

action.name: Six Ruin Knights
entries: The ruin knights appear in unoccupied spaces within 5 feet of the judicator, and make a total of six attacks with their longbows. The longbows have {@hit 11} to hit, range 500 ft., one target, and deals 9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) piercing damage on a hit.

action.name: Three Witches
entries: The witches appear in unoccupied spaces within 30 feet of the judicator and unleash a wave of dark energy at up to three targets. Each target must succeed on a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw or take 39 ({@damage 6d12}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Silver Knight Ledo
entries: The knght appers in an unoccupied space within 15 feet of the judicator and makes an attack with his hammer against a target within reach. The attack has {@hit 13} to hit, reach 5 feet, one target, and deals 27 ({@damage 6d6 + 7}) bludgeoning damage plus 27 ({@damage 6d8}) thunder damage, and if the target is a creature, it is knocked {@condition prone}.

variant.name: Variant Cursed Slave
entries: Some ringed city slaves have large dark crystals growing out of their form. These hollows use the ringed city slave statistics but with the following changes:

items: It gains the Curse Aura trait detailed below.
It loses access to the Lightning Spear action option.

items.name: Curse Aura
entries: Each creature of the slave's choice that starts its turn within 30 feet of the slave must succeed on a DC Contitution saving throw or be {@condition restrained} as they begin to turn to stone. A {@condition restrained} creature must repeat the saving throw at the start of its next turn. On a failed save, the target is {@condition petrified}. On a successful save, the effect ends.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The slave uses Lightning Spear twice.

action.name: Lightning Spear
entries: {@atk ms,rs} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 90 ft., one target. {@h}28 ({@damage 8d6}) lightning damage.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}({@dice 1d8 + 3}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Circle of Death
entries: The cleric generates deadly energy in a 5-foot cylinder that is 10-feet high, centered on a point within 150 feet of it, ignoring cover. Each creature in that area Must make a {@dc 19} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes 31 ({@damage 9d8}) necrotic damage and takes one level of {@condition exhaustion}. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage and doesn't gain a level of {@condition exhaustion}.

action.name: Shell
entries: The cleric retreats into its shell or exits its shell. While in its shell, the cleric is {@condition prone}, has resistance to all damage except psychic damage, and heals 30 hit points when it enters its shell and at the start of each of its turns while in the shell. Additionally, each creature that starts its turn within 5 feet of the cleric while it is in its shell takes 22 ({@damage 4d10}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Corona Spin (Recharges After a Short or Long Rest)
entries: The cleric spins as it moves up to 60 feet in a straight line, ignoring difficult terrain. Each creature it moves within 5 feet of must succeed on a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw or take 75 ({@damage 10d12}) radiant damage.

trait.name: Brute
entries: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the ringed knight hits with it (included in the attack).

trait.name: Mighty Wielder
entries: The ringed knight can wield a two-handed melee weapon in one hand and make attacks with it one-handed.

trait.name: Varied Weaponry
entries: The ringed knight has different action options based on which weapon it wields: a longsword or lance.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The ringed knight makes three attacks.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 5ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@dice 2d8 + 8}) magical slashing damage, or 19 ({@dice 2d10 + 8}) magical slashing damage if wielded with two hands.

action.name: Lance
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@dice 2d12 + 8}) magical piercing damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) fire damage.

action.name: Burning Slash {@recharge 5}
entries: The ringed knight ignites its blade and makes 5 attacks with its longsword against one target within reach. Each attack deals an additional 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage.

bonus.name: Dragon Roar (Recharge 5-6; Lance Only)
entries: The ringed knight's shield emits a mighty roar. Each creature within 5 feet of the ringed knight must succeed on a DC Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The locust preacher uses Feasting Branch five times.

action.name: Feasting Branch
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 3d6 + 7}) force damage. On a critical hit, the preacher rolls for damage three times, instead of twice.

action.name: Wax Burst
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}The target has its speed reduced by 5 feet for 1 minute. Each time the target is hit by this attack, its speed is reduced by a further 5 feet, to a minimum of 0.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Midir fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Midir has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Midir can use his Frightful Presence. He then makes three attacks: one with his bite and two with his claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 18} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}29 ({@damage 3d12 + 10}) piercing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 20}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, it automatically fails its saving throws to resist Midir's breath weapon, and Midir can't bite another target.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 18} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}23 ({@damage 3d8 + 10}) slashing damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 18} to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}26 ({@damage 3d10 + 10}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Each creature of Midir's choice that is within 120 feet of Midir and aware of him must succeed on a {@dc 20} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to Midir's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Breath Weapon {@recharge 5}
entries: Midir uses one of the following breath weapons.

action.name: Fire Breath
entries: Midir exhales fire in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 26} Dexterity saving throw, taking 98 ({@damage 28d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Dark Laser
entries: Midir releases a necrotic laser in a 150-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a {@dc 26} Dexterity saving throw. On a failure, a creature takes 87 ({@damage 25d6}) necrotic damage and is knocked {@condition prone}. On a success, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't knocked {@condition prone}.

legendary.name: Detect
entries: Midir makes a Wisdom (Perception) check.

legendary.name: Move
entries: Midir moves up to half his speed.

legendary.name: Tail Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Midir makes a tail attack.

legendary.name: Mass Affinity (Costs 3 Actions; Must Be Below Half Hit Points)
entries: Midir summons darkness around him, releasing it in a powerful blast. Each creature within 90 feet of Midir must succeed on a {@dc 20} Dexterity saving throw or take 39 ({@damage 6d12}) necrotic damage.

trait.name: Brute

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The ringed knight makes three attacks.

bonus.name: Ember (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The ringed knight awakens a temporary flame in its swords. Until the end of its turn, its oversized greatsword deals an additional 10 ({@damage 3d6}) fire damage when it hits with an attack (include in the attack).

legendary.name: Detect
entries: The ringed knight makes a Wisdom (Perception) check.

legendary.name: Move

legendary.name: Attack (Costs 2 Actions)

action.name: Multiattack

action.name: Frayed Blade
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@dice 1d8 + 7}) magical slashing damage.

action.name: White Birch Bow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 14} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@dice 1d6 + 7}) magical piercing damage.

action.name: Divine Spears {@recharge 5}
entries: Halflight magically summons divine spears from the ground in a 60-foot line that is 5 feet wide, forming a 10-foot-high wall that lasts until the end of Halflight's next turn. When the wall appears, each creature within its area must make a {@dc 20} Dexterity saving throw, taking 70 ({@damage 20d6}) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

The wall grants half cover to all creatures behind it. While the wall lasts, each creature that starts its turn in the wall, enters the wall for the first time on a turn, or touches or reaches through the wall with any part of its body takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) lightning damage.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: Halflight makes a Frayed Blade attack.

legendary.name: Move
entries: Halflight moves up to half his speed.

legendary.name: Black Snake (Costs 2 Actions)

legendary.name: Radiant Daggers (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Halflight summons several darts of solidified divine power. The next time a creature starts its turn within 15 feet of Halflight or comes within 15 feet of him before the start of his next turn, the creature must succeed on a {@dc 20} Dexterity saving throw or take 21 ({@damage 6d6}) radiant damage.

monster.name: Slave Knight Gael

trait.name: Blood of the Dark Soul (Mythic Trait; Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: If Gael is reduced to 0 hit points or targeted by an effect that would instantly kill or destroy him, he isn't knocked {@condition unconscious}, killed, or destroyed. Instead, he gains 240 temporary hit points, loses access to the Repeating Crossbow legendary action option and Way of White Corona action, and releases an explosion of dark energy, quickly followed by lightning striking from above. Each creature within 30 feet of Gael must make a {@dc 26} Dexterity saving throw, taking 27 ({@damage 6d8}) necrotic damage and 27 ({@damage 6d8}) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
Gael only dies or is destroyed when these temporary hit points are reduced to 0.

trait.name: Brutal Critical (Must be Above Half Hit points)
entries: Whenever Gael scores a critical hit with his greatsword against a Medium or smaller creature, the target takes an additional 21 ({@damage 6d6}) slashing damage and is thrown up to 60 feet away from Gael, landing {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (5/Day)
entries: If Gael fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Mighty Wielder
entries: Gael can wield a two-handed melee weapon in one hand and make attacks with it one-handed.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Gael makes three attacks.

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 19} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}24 ({@dice 4d6 + 10}) magical slashing damage, plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) necrotic damage if Gael has fewer than half of his hit points remaining.

action.name: Way of White Corona {@recharge 5}
entries: Gael magically sends five 5-foot-diameter spectral discs flying in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 23} Dexterity saving throw or take 39 ({@damage 6d12}) slashing damage. The discs then each remain hovering in a 5-foot space at the end of the cone.

At the start of Gael's next turn, the discs fly back to Gael in a straight line. Each creature in the path of one or more discs must succeed on a {@dc 23} Dexterity saving throw or take 39 ({@damage 6d12}) slashing damage. The discs disappear upon reaching Gael.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: Gael makes one attack with his greatsword.

legendary.name: Teleport (Costs 2 Actions; Must Be Below Half Hit Points)
entries: Gael magically teleports, along with any equipment he is wearing or carrying, to an unoccupied space he can see.

legendary.name: Repeating Crossbow (Costs 2 Actions; Must be Below Half Hit Points)
entries: Gael unleashes a barrage of bolts from his crossbow in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 24} Dexterity saving throw or take 38 ({@damage 11d6}) piercing damage.

mythicHeader: If Gael's mythic trait is active, he can use the option below as a legendary action for 1 hour after using Blood of the Dark Soul.

mythic.name: Soul Rage (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Gael unleashes a burst of dark energy, which is quickly followed by lightning striking from above. Each creature within 30 feet of Gael must make a {@dc 26} Dexterity saving throw, taking 27 ({@damage 6d8}) necrotic damage and 27 ({@damage 6d8}) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Her alignment shifts to chaotic evil.
Her Intelligence becomes 7 (-2), her Wisdom becomes 8 (-1), and her Charisma becomes 6 (-2).
She has a Challenge Rating of 8 (3,900 XP).
She loses access to the Longsword attack option and gains access to the Broken Sword attack option.

variantrule.name: Weapon Infusions
entries: A nonmagical non-boss weapon can gain an infusion. A weapon can have no more than one infusion at a time. It must be left with a blacksmith with an appropriate gem and appropriate coal over a short rest. Infused weapons gain benefits depending on the gem.

items: Removing an infusion. Removing an infusion from a weapon requires a Shriving Stone and 1 hour with a blacksmith.
Fire Infusion (requires Fire Gem). The weapon deals an additional {@damage 1d6} fire damage on a hit.
Poison Infusion (requires Poison Gem and Farron Coal). A creature hit by this weapon must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute.
Crystal Infusion (requires Crystal Gem and Sage's Coal). The weapon deals additional force damage on a hit equal to your Intelligence modifier.

Blessed Infusion (requires Blessed Gem and Sage's Coal). The weapon deals additional radiant damage on a hit equal to your Wisdom modifier, and if you have at least 1 hit point at the start of your turn, you regain 1 hit point.
Deep Infusion (requires Deep Gem and Sage's Coal). The weapon deals an additional {@damage 1d6} necrotic damage on a hit.
Dark Infusion (Requires Deep Gem and Profaned Coal). The weapon deals additional necrotic damage on a hit equal to your Charisma modifier.
Lightning Infusion (requires Lightning Gem and Giant's Coal). The weapon deals additional lightning damage equal to your Wisdom Modifier.
Chaos Infusion (requires Chaos Gem and Giant's Coal). The weapon deals additonal fire damage equal to your Charisma modifier.

item.name: Stormruler
entries: While you are wielding this greatsword, you can spend a bonus action to charge it up, surrounding the blade with howling winds. Once the sword is charged, you can spend an action to make a melee weapon attack with the charged blade, treating it as though it had a reach of 50 feet. On a hit, the target takes damage as normal. If the target is Yhorm, on a hit he instead takes 100 points of magical slashing damage and is knocked {@condition prone}.

item.name: Soldering Iron
entries: When you hit a creature with this weapon, the target can't regain hit points until the end of its next turn.

item.name: Onyx Blade
entries: As a bonus action, you coat the weapon in black flames for 1 minute. While these flames last, the weapon deals an additional {@damage 3d6} necrotic damage on a hit.

item.name: Smough's Great Hammer
entries: When you hit a creature other than an undead or construct with this weapon, you regain 4 hit points.

item.name: Morne's Great Hammer
entries: The hammer has 3 charges. As an action, you can expend a charge to release a thunderous blast around you. Each creature within 10 feet of you must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or take {@damage 4d6} thunder damage and be pushed up to 10 feet away from you. The hammer regains 3 expended charges at dawn.

item.name: Moonlight Greatsword
entries: The sword has 10 charges. When you take the {@action Attack} action, you can choose to expend a charge to replace one of your attacks with a beam of energy. Make an attack with the greatsword against a target within 30 feet of you. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 3d6} force damage. The greatsword regains {@dice 1d6 + 4} expended charges at dawn.

item.name: Fume Ultra Greatsword
entries: While wielding this weapon with two hands, you gain a +1 bonus to AC.

item.name: Frayed Blade
entries: The sword has 6 charges. As an action, you can send a wave of black flames at a creature you can see on the ground within 60 feet of you. The target must succeed of a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw or take {@damage 5d8} necrotic damage.

item.name: Demon's Scar
entries: The demon's scar can be used as an {@item arcane focus} and a {@item druidic focus}.

item.name: Darkdift
entries: Melee attacks made with darkdrift ignore any bonuses to AC from {@item shield||shields}, the {@spell shield} spell, or the {@spell shield of faith} spell.

item.name: Dancer's Enchanted Swords
entries: The sword has 10 charges. When you take the {@action Attack} action, you can choose to expend a charge to replace one of your attacks with a beam of energy. Make an attack with the sword against a target within 30 feet of you. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 3d6} force damage. The sword regains {@dice 1d6 + 4} expended charges at dawn.

item.name: Crescent Moon Blade
entries: The sword has 10 charges. When you take the {@action Attack} action, you can choose to expend a charge to replace one of your attacks with a beam of energy. Make an attack with the sword against a target within 30 feet of you. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 3d6} force damage. The sword regains {@dice 1d6 + 4} expended charges at dawn.

item.name: Aquamarine Dagger
entries: The dagger has 10 charges and regains {@dice 1d6 + 4} charges daily at dawn. As a bonus action, you can expend a charge to generate a blade of crystal energy for 1 minute. While this blade lasts, the dagger functions as a {@item rapier} and deals an additional {@damage 1d6} force damage on a hit.

item.name: Aldrich's Ruby
entries: While wearing this ring, if you roll a 20 on an attack roll against a creature you gain 10 temporary hit points.

item.name: Dragoncrest Ring (+2)
entries: While wearing this ring, you gain a +2 bonus to spell attack rolls and your spell save DCs.

item.name: Dragoncrest Ring (+1)
entries: While wearing this ring, you gain a +1 bonus to spell attack rolls and your spell save DC.

item.name: Flynn's Ring
entries: While wearing this ring, you gain a bonus to weapon attack and damage rolls determined by the amount of weight you are wearing or carrying.

item.name: Four Pillars Ring
entries: You gain a +2 bonus to an Ability score while wearing this ring. The image on the ring indicates the Ability score, which the DM chooses or determines randomly.

item.name: Hawk Ring
entries: While wearing this ring, the normal and maximum range of your ranged weapon attacks increases by 10 feet.

item.name: Wolf Ring
entries: While wearing this ring, you have advantage on checks and saving throws to avoid being knocked {@condition prone}.

item.name: Slumbering Dragoncrest Ring
entries: While you wear this ring, your movement makes no sound and you have advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks made to move quietly.

item.name: Saint's Ring
item.reqAttune: by a cleric, druid, paladin, ranger, or wizard
entries: While wearing this ring, you can prepare 1 additional spell.

item.name: Red Tearstone Ring
entries: While wearing this ring, if you have a number of hit points remaining equal to or less than 20% of your hit point maximum (minimum of 1), you gain a bonus to damage rolls equal to you proficiency bonus.

item.name: Hornet Ring
entries: While wearing this ring, you can roll one additional weapon damage die when determining the extra damage for a critical hit with a melee attack.

item.name: Deep Ring
item.reqAttune: by a cleric, druid, paladin, ranger, or wizard
entries: While wearing this ring, you can prepare 1 additional spell.

item.name: Carthus Milkring
entries: While wearing this ring, when you take the {@action Dodge} action you turn {@condition invisible} until the start of your next turn.

item.name: Carthus Bloodring
entries: While wearing this ring, when you take the {@action Dodge} action you gain a +2 bonus to AC that lasts until the start of your next turn.

item.name: Blue Tearstone Ring
entries: While wearing this ring, if you have a number of hit points remaining equal to or less than 20% of your hit point maximum (minimum of 1), you gain resistance to all damage.

entriesTemplate.name: Elemental
entries: The weapon deals {{item.elemental}} additional damage on a hit.

entries.name: Large
entries: Medium creatures have disadvantage on attack rolls with large weapons. Small and Tiny creatures can't make attacks with large weapons. A large weapon's size and bulk make it too large for a Medium creature to use effectively.

trap.name: Rolling Skeleton Ball
effect: This 10-foot-diameter sphere is comprised of undead skeletons, and can roll uphill and downhill to squash intruders.

The skeleton ball acts on Initiative count 10. On its turn, the ball rolls up to 100 feet in a straight line. Each creature in its path must make a DC 20 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 38 ({@damage 7d10}) bludgeoning damage and is knocked {@condition prone}. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't knocked {@condition prone}.
The ball stops when it hits a wall or similar barrier, before moving back the way it came on the next Initiative count 20. It can't go around corners.
countermeasures: There is a {@creature carthus skeleton|DarkSoulsIIILordSeekersCompendium} with no attacks wearing a pointed hat and carrying a staff. If this skeleton is slain, the skeleton ball rolls until it hits a wall or similar barrier, where it shatters on impact.
entries: {@b {@i Location:}} Catacombs of Carthus

trap.name: Giant Avelyn
effect: Acts on Initiative count 20, but can't act two rounds in a row. On its turn, it makes three attacks against one PC within range. It has {@hit 11} to hit, range 1200 ft., and deals 33 ({@damage 6d10}) piercing damage on a hit. This attack can't gain advantage or disadvantage.
trigger: The Giant Avelyn activates when a PC enters ths Smouldering Lake.
countermeasures: There is a large lever atached to the base of the Giant Avelyn. As an Action, a creature can turn this lever, deactivating the Giant Avelyn. If the Giant Avelyn is deactivated, turning the lever activates it.
entries: {@b {@i Location:}} Smouldering Lake

trap.name: Cursed Claw
effect: Each creature within 5 feet of the book when the claws emerge must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw or take 11 ({@damage 2d10}) slashing damage. The claws are immune to damage and after emerging remain until there have been no creatures within 5 feet of them for 2 rounds.

While the claws are emerged, each creature that starts its turn within 5 feet of the claws or moves within 5 feet of the claws for the first time on its turn must make a DC 20 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature is {@condition poisoned}. The poisoned target must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn. On a success, the effect ends on the target. On a failure, the target is {@condition petrified} until freed by the {@spell greater restoration} spell or other magic.
trigger: A creature walks within 5 feet of the books the claws are in.
countermeasures: While the claws are not out, the books are indistinguishable from ordinary books. If a creature coats its head in wax, it is immune to the effects of the cursed claw.
entries: These spectral arms hide in books in the Grand Archives, jumping out to attack creatures nearby and slwoly petrifying creatures nearby.
